name: Slitterhead
summary:
Set in the densely cluttered streets of "Kowlong," filled with obscurity and chaos, this battle action-adventure game casts players as the "Hyoki," an entity devoid of memory and physical form. His only motive is to eradicate the monstrous beings known as "Slitterheads" crawling around the city, disguising themselves as humans.

Roaming the vibrant neon-lit cityscape, players must seek out allies among humans known as "Rarities," infiltrate and track dangerous organizations, and engage in battles harnessing the power of blood. As the suspenseful drama unfolds, delve into the mystery behind Hyoki's existence and the appearance of the Slitterheads.

name: Sláine: The Celtic Barbarian
summary: In Sláine: The Celtic Barbarian you embark on a quest to liberate Lyonesse from the lingering evil of the Drune Wizards. As the titular hero, you must rescue the beautiful daughter of the last Drune from Small Sky Tower, for only she knows the secret name that will break the curse. Navigate through a unique real-time menu system called REFLEX, which adds urgency to your exploration, object interactions, and combat. Manage Slaine's Warp rating, a dynamic stat affected by battles and replenished through various means, as you wield your mighty sword and unravel the mysteries of Lyonesse in this thrilling action-adventure game.

name: Slay
summary: Slay is a turn based strategy game where your goal is to conquer the island by buying men and using them to capture your enemies' hexagons. By combining two men you can create a single more powerful man who is able to kill weaker men. The twist to the game is that the more powerful a man that you create is, the more expensive he is to maintain

name: Slime Mori-mori Dragon Quest 3: Daikaizoku to Shippo-dan
summary:
A spinoff video game to the Dragon Quest series, and the third entry in the Slime subseries. It was released in Japan for the Nintendo 3DS on November 2, 2011.

The story follows Surarin, a slime, who goes on a quest to retrieve his countries prized jewels, known as "Rainbow Orbs", from a group of pirates who have stolen them.

name: Slingo Quest
summary: Slingo Quest combines two classics, slots and bingo, in the ultimate puzzle game. Spin the traditional 5-reel slot machine, then match the numbers on your card down, across or diagonal, and you've hit a Slingo! Create as many Slingos as you can in 20 spins with the help of fun power-ups in this tropical adventure.

name: Slime Ascension
summary: Climb up

name: Sleepy Meadow
summary: Wander, unwind, and let the meadow carry you away.

name: Slashzone
summary: A multiplayer horror game for 5 players. In each round, one becomes the slasher. Work as a team—until you don't. Manipulate, survive, and escape with the most points. Only one will earn their freedom.

name: Slice Surge
summary: Unleash your slicing skills in Slice Surge! Cut through dragons, fries, treasure, and more in 100+ fun and challenging levels. With colorful cartoon visuals and satisfying slice effects, this one-touch puzzle game is easy to learn but hard to master!

name: Slip 'n Dip
summary: Slip 'n Dip is a local multiplayer game where up to 4 penguins fight for survival on rapidly melting ice. Jump and slide around the ice to knock off your opponents before they can knock you off!

name: Slayers for Hire
summary: Slayers for Hire is an indie platform fighter with an emphasis on speed, precision, and creative characters. If you want something fresh to play with your friends, look no further. Playable online or locally with 2-4 players.

name: Slut Nurses
summary: Slut Nurses is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: Slapstick Bosses
summary: A wacky boss fighting game with a charming and unique style, where the only goal is to beat them all! Collect Bits to unlock cool cosmetics! Can you master each boss on their hardest difficultys?

name: Sleepover
summary: In Sleepover, you're either the Slasher, or the Homeowner. The Slasher is loud and has a knife, but the Homeowner is quiet and can grab the Slasher from behind. After the police are called, they arrive in three minutes. Sleepover, a Slasher simulator.

name: Slendytubbies
summary: Slendytubbies is a horror game based on Slenderman in which you need to hunt down all the Teletubbies Pies in order to win.

name: Sled Together
summary: Compete on crazy tracks, race on turbo sleds, collect boosters and... launch your penguin into flight! The winner is the one who best combines speed, precision and aerodynamics

name: Slendrina Must Die: The House
summary:
Slendrina Must Die: The House is yet another fantastic episode in the creepy Slendrina Must Die series. In this title, you get to find out more about this strange and sinister creature and her origins.

Game is based on House of Slendrina.

name: Slap Fight MD
summary: Slap Fight MD (スラップファイト) is a 1993 shoot-'em-up game developed by Toaplan and MNM Software for the Sega Mega Drive and published by Tengen exclusively in Japan and South Korea. Two games are available: a port of Toaplan's 1986 arcade shoot-'em-up Slap Fight with the choice to use either remastered music or the original sound, and a separate game called Slap Fight MD, that has the same gameplay mechanics but new art, levels, weapons, and music (composed by Yuzo Koshiro). The option to switch between Slap Fight and Slap Fight MD is in the Options menu under "Game Mode," with Normal enabling Slap Fight and Special enabling Slap Fight MD.

name: Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 4
summary: Slenderman Must Die: Silent Streets is an intense and chilling first person shooter game with horror elements.

name: Slime Musume ha Ningen to Tomodachi ni Naritai you da
summary: “Hello, humans! Will you be my friend?” This is a point-and-click novel game about Aura, a slime girl who wants to become friends with humans. Aura is pure and innocent, and easily influenced by the emotions of the humans she meets...

name: Slam Dunk: Yonkyou Gekitotsu!!
summary: Basketball video game developed by TOSE and published by Bandai for the Super Famicom in 1994. First game of the "Slam Dunk" franchise.

name: Slime Alchemy
summary: Slime Alchemy is a relaxing puzzle game where you must place pieces in specific locations on a hexagonal grid.

name: Slay the Minotaur
summary: Slay the Minotaur is a challenging roguelike dungeon crawler set in ancient Greece. Survive the onslaught of the labyrinth. Upgrade your skills, earn ranks, and face the Minotaur in the ultimate game of cat and mouse!

name: Slugterra: Slug it Out 2
summary:
Connect to other Slugslingers; Add friends, duel, and send gifts!

Become the strongest slugslinger around with a powerful army of slugs!

Solve puzzles, level up slugs, and duel your friends in this adventurous slug shooter game, Slugterra: Slug it Out 2! Travel through the different caverns, full of stories, enemies, and prizes, though be aware that some of these caverns are only available for a limited amount of time, so you'd better hurry and explore them before it's too late.

There is a whole different world underneath the surface, known as Slugterra! Explore this luminous, high-tech world and venture into the nooks and crannies of the 99 Caverns. Along the way, you'll find slugs that have special talents that let them transform into powerful and magical beasts! Work with your slugs to defeat any enemies by training, evolving, and maybe even unlocking their fusion power! You may even be able to befriend the legendary ancestors of all the slugs, the Elementals!

name: Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 8
summary:
In the episode titled From Burn To Return (Hell Fire), Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 8, demons take over the town and kidnap everyone. A horror game.

In this chapter, Slenderman has gained the power of fire, making him more dangerous than ever before, and the only man who can stop him is the town's brave firefighter.

As the player, you must save the town from this fiery nightmare.

name: Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus
summary: A port of Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save and custom video filters.

name: Slime-san: Superslime Edition
summary:
"Slime-san: Superslime Edition includes all three major campaigns as well as some brand new, exclusive levels and features!

Mama’s Madness: You’ve been swallowed by a giant worm! Your goal is to platform yourself through its intestines back out its mouth before you get digested!

Blackbird’s Kraken: You were about to take a vacation with your family and got eaten whole by a giant Kraken?! Once more you’ll need to jump, slime & slide your way out!

Sheeple’s Sequel: Sheeple believes he’s an NPC in a video game and decides to recode himself as the villain! Can you beat his mind-bending levels?

Superslime Edition packs an extra 10 exclusive levels where you can play as Grandpa-san himself! It also includes a “Dynamic Colors” feature that alters the game’s color palette to a unique one for each world. Slime-san’s more colorful than ever!"

name: Slimeward
summary: Slimeward is an idle game where players build and upgrade a village, recruit heroes, and defeat Monster 'Slime' that fell in front of the house one day,

name: Slow Living With Princess
summary: Slow Living With Princesss is an RPG adventure game. Gideon Ragnason has been discharged from the Hero's party because he was not "strong enough". Since then, he has retired from the front lines of the battle and changed his name to Red. Now he opens an apothecary in the frontier called Zoltan and hopes to have a happy slow living life style.

name: Sliding Bears
summary: Slide alone or with friends! The polar bear cubs have come out to play and they have decided to have fun on the ice with a single objective in mind: be the last one standing! Use item boxes to counter your foes' victory and be the winner!

name: Slendrina Must Die: The Asylum
summary:
Slendrina Must Die is back in a new scary adventure! The Asylum! Now with new level added (currently Android only), The Asylum Backyard. More Action.

Game is based on Slendrina: Asylum

name: Slime Rancher
summary: Slime Rancher is a charming, first-person, sandbox experience. Play as Beatrix LeBeau: a plucky, young rancher who sets out for a life a thousand light years away from Earth on the 'Far, Far Range.' Each day will present new challenges and risky opportunities as you attempt to amass a great fortune in the business of slime ranching. Collect colorful slimes, grow crops, harvest resources, and explore the untamed wilds through the mastery of your all-purpose vacpack.

name: Sleepless in the Sapphire City
summary: Reflections of a postmodern vampire.

name: Sloth Simulator Almost
summary: Sloth Simulator is a round based combat mini game with fun gadgets and action heavy movement skills to unlock. Play as and upgrade your slot! Defeat enemies and unlock different islands as you adventure!

name: Slime Order
summary: Players just decide the order of the slimes! A puzzle game that is easy to play.

name: Slay Together
summary: Slay Together is a multiplayer game for up to 4 players in which you fight together with your heavy armed teammates against a horde of wild villagers.

name: Slavic Gods Rodnoverie
summary: Slash dungeon monsters, survive and protect shrine! Upgrade your God powers & support your champion!

name: Slice and Bite
summary: You are a pizza delivering vampire in demon infested medieval Italy. Choose your delivery routes and upgrade your magical carriage. Save your family pizzeria from certain doom by slicing your way through levels, defeating challenging boss fights, uncovering secrets and exploring the world.

name: Slam Bolt Scrappers
summary: Build and brawl in this fast and frantic mash-up! Race your opponents to build the most powerful towers in Slam Bolt City while defending against deceptively adorable baddies and hugely epic bosses. Create weapons that shoot lasers, drills, missiles, and more to annihilate your adversary. Battle in four-player co-op campaign mode, or go head-to-head for more brawling and block-building awesomeness.

name: Slender-Man
summary: Slender-Man (AKA Call of Slender) is the original survival horror game for mobile based upon the Slender-Man urban legend and "Der Großmann" myth.

name: Slaughtra
summary: Slaughtra is a arcade styled top-down horde shooter where you face off against an ever growing onslaught of enemies seeking nothing but to end you. Fight your way through and maybe somehow you'll find your way out of this nightmare...

name: Slivercall
summary: Silvercall​​ – A retro action-platformer RPG. Play as an amnesiac adventurer, battling through perilous terrain and collecting Memory Crystals to uncover your past and your lover's dark transformation into the "Saintess".

name: Slick Shot
summary: Slick Shot is a 1990 billiard arcade game developed and produced by Grand Products. Players choose one of two billiard games: Slickshot or 9 ball. Using a real cue stick and ball on a small pool table surface, a player must shoot the ball into the game cabinet to simulate the shot on the video screen. Infrared sensors on the table slate calculate the speed and direction the ball is traveling.

name: Slimes Arena
summary: Slimes Arena is a 2D action roguelite featuring minimalist pixel art and wave-based combat. Players control a slime navigating increasingly chaotic arenas, combining movement, positioning, and timing to survive. The game emphasizes synergy between offensive and passive abilities, with progression tied to performance in each arena.

name: Slayaway Camp: Butcher's Cut
summary: A killer puzzle game where you control Skullface, a psychotic slasher hellbent on revenge. Slide this adorably demented murderer around hundreds of isometric puzzle levels to squash, flay, and decapitate hapless victims in this darkly comic homage to '80s horror movies.

name: Sleepfall
summary:
A journey through the depths of consciousness...
Sleepfall is not simply a game. It is rather an experience one goes through while falling into sleep...
The flow and the visuals of Sleepfall synesthetically follow the features of one of the best musical pieces ever created, J.S. Bach's Prelude from Cello Suite No.1, which accompanies your journey
You will travel through several layers of your own mind finally leading to the Dream...
Dare to dive into the depths of consciousness?

name: Slayers, Inc.
summary: Slayers, Inc. is a roguelite twin-stick shooter about killing hordes of demons. Acquire items to brutalize them in new and unique ways, empower yourself with Artifacts to kill 'em with style, don't forget to keep your combo going, and give those infernal fools the boot!

name: Slay the Wak
summary:
Fan games of "woowakgood"
Year-end contest entries for the year 2021, 2022

name: Slendergus
summary:
Run and hide from Impostor amogus in the haunted skeld map! Survive and collect 8 pages to win the game!

Play in singleplayer or in multiplayer with your friends!

name: Slither Snake IO 2018
summary: Slither.io is a massively multiplayer online video game available for iOS, Android, and web browsers, developed by Steve Howse. Players control an avatar resembling a worm, which consumes multicolored pellets, both from other players and ones that naturally spawn on the map in the game, to grow in size. The objective of the game is to grow the longest worm in the server. Slither.io is similar in concept to the popular 2015 web game Agar.io and is reminiscent of the classic arcade game Snake.

name: Slide to Spell
summary:
Slide lines or columns of letters to form words spelled
either vertically or horizontally. You want to get the longest words possible.
The game has three modes: hard mode is a nightmare and in easy the game almost plays itself. Quite fascinating to watch, really.

name: Slimy Harvest
summary: Harvest Slime Monster eggs for the Alchemists. Buy equipment to automate the process and combine Slimes into new types for more profit and to explore deeper into the dungeon.

name: Slyders
summary: Fight against insane hordes of demons to prevent an evil overlord from conquering Sky World in this first-person survival roguelike shooter. With an arsenal of weapons, perks, and items, the battlefield quickly transforms into a fast-paced bullet hell.

name: Slender: New Hope
summary: Slender - New Hope is based on Slender: The Eight Pages, but with modern graphic, better AI, bigger environment & discoverable deep woods!

name: Slaycation Paradise
summary: Are you tired of the same boring old vacations? Then boy have we got the tonic for you! Slaycation Paradise offers the ultimate in multi-dimensional apocalyptic tours. Slay away your worries with Twin-Stick action mixed with Tower Defence as you visit the end-of-world scenarios of your dreams!

name: Slobbish Dragon Princess 2
summary: Takeru and Haru's life of slacc is upended once more as Iris, dragon queen of the Sea and Water factions shows up on Earth to claim the seas and bar all humans from entering them. Hijinks and plenty of dragon girls await in Slobbish Dragon Princess 2!

name: Slashboy
summary: It's time to protect the world from... Mushrooms. Play as a samurai against a crowd of mushrooms, ordinary and not so. Cut, use magic, but destroy as many mushrooms as you can. Compete with others and prove who is the real mushroom destroyer!

name: Slamscape
summary:
SlamScape is a 3D shooting game set in a surreal world of bomb-throwing ferris wheels, deadly teddy bears, exploding balloons, bottled brains on unicycles and a Scary-Go-Round, a spinning seagull named Gullicopter, a monstrous creation called Crabzilla and other bizarre enemies.

Your objective is to pilot a rocket-mounted pile driver called a Slamjet while shooting, blasting, smashing and jumping anything and everything you see throughout four dangerous regions. Derived from your subconscious, the regions contain four heavily guarded Orb-Ids needed for level progression. Once obtained, you'll then take the orbs to a central location within that level. You must employ a different strategy for each orb you wish to obtain.

name: Slingoween
summary: Slingoween is a Halloween-themed mini-game where players control a pumpkin-headed character, Sling, using a grappling mechanic to collect candy and avoid obstacles like ghosts and pumpkins. The objective is to navigate through levels by attaching to "grabs" to turn them green, ultimately reaching a portal to advance.

name: Slice&Dice
summary: Slice & Dice is a puzzle game where the objective is to place the die in the goal frame. Using realistic physics, the player can move the die by affecting the cubes within the environment through a variety of actions like slicing and destroying them. It's a party game that players and viewers alike can enjoy!

name: Slush Invaders: Game
summary: A stickman skill-toss flash game made by Gildedguy where you must rescue your captured fighters and stop the villain by launching him into the skies. It has a very colorful aesthetic, derivative from stick animations from it's time. Features a lot of playable characters that allows for different team combinations with varying functions and upgrades for each member.

name: Sly Cooper: Thieves in Time
summary:
Sly Cooper: Thieves in Time is a stealth platformer developed by Sanzaru Games and published by Sony Computer Entertainment. Released in 2013 for PlayStation 3 and PlayStation Vita, it is the fourth main entry in the Sly Cooper series.

The game follows Sly and his gang as they travel through different historical periods to restore the Thievius Raccoonus, which is being erased from existence. Players control Sly and various characters, each with unique abilities while completing stealth-based missions, platforming challenges, and puzzles. The game retains the series’ signature cel-shaded art style and humour while introducing new mechanics, including time-travelling settings and costumes with special abilities.

name: Slordax: The Unknown Enemy
summary: In this classic top-down shoot 'em up, fly the deadliest ship in the galaxy on a dangerous first-strike mission to annihilate an alien threat before they become too powerful to stop. Pick up upgrades from fallen enemies along the way and become an unstoppable force!

name: Sleep Paralysis: The Uncanny Valley
summary: A story-rich first-person psychological horror game. You are in a lonely house, suffering from sleep paralysis. Deal with Thomas’ past trauma and make meaningful decisions that prevent you from going insane.

name: SlimeLabs
summary: You are a slime trying to traverse the labs with your ability to jump, shoot, control projectile speed and equip fancy hats and weapons. What could possibly go wrong?

name: Slumhack
summary: Slumhack is an action-based puzzle game set in a post-pandemic world, one just like ours. Play as Neriko, a young girl living in a modern ghetto born of such reality, and hack your way through the streets of Cyberia to bring back hope and peace to the slum.

name: Slasher
summary: Slasher is a Retro third person multiplayer thriller game where you play as either a civilian or the Slasher. Run, hide and outlast the other players while being hunted by the Slasher. A random player chosen to be the Slasher must hunt down and eliminate the other players before time runs out.

name: Slap Fighter
summary: Step into Slap Fighter, the first VR game of slap fighting! Use elemental powers, execute epic combos, and uncover dark secrets in a dystopian city ruled by the Slap Syndicate.

name: Slide in the Woods
summary: Ride it, see where it takes you.

name: Slide Hexagon
summary: This is a simple puzzle game. Click and slide the hexagon to solve it.

name: Sleeping Dogs: Definitive Edition
summary:
The Definitive Edition of the critically acclaimed, award winning open-world action adventure, reworked, rebuilt and re-mastered for the new generation. With all previously available DLC included and a wealth of tech and visual improvements, Hong Kong has never felt so alive.

A vibrant, neon city teaming with life, Hong Kong’s exotic locations and busy streets and markets hide one of the most powerful and dangerous criminal organizations in the world: the notorious Triads. Play as Wei Shen – the highly skilled undercover cop trying to take down the Triads from the inside out. You'll have to prove yourself worthy as you fight your way up the organization, taking part in brutal criminal activities without blowing your cover.

Destroy your opponents in brutal hand-to-hand combat using an unmatched martial arts system. Dominate Hong Kong’s buzzing streets in thrilling illegal street races and tear it up in explosive firearms action. Sleeping Dogs’ Hong Kong is the ultimate playground.

name: Slime Factory
summary: Slime Factory is a game in which you have to develop your factory for breeding Slimes. Manage resources and construction, unlock new building types, and explore a variety of biomes in an open world!

name: SlideNGlide
summary: A challenging action-platformer where players navigate diverse biomes filled with unique enemies, tough platforming challenges, and intense boss fights. With tight controls and punishing difficulty, the game rewards precision, mastery, and exploration.

name: Slingshot people
summary: It's fun to shoot people with a slingshot, but beware, they are armed and dangerous!

name: Slender Man: Downpour
summary: A classic style Slender Man game that you can play straight from your web-browser! Keep in mind that the downloadable version runs much better.

name: Slayer's Testament
summary: A Quake 1 mod designed to recreate the experience of Doom 2016 within the Quake engine

name: Slizza
summary:
Slizza is a fast-moving, action-puzzle arcade game for iOS and Android that you won't be able to drop out of your hands. Hundreds of single player levels, local or online multiplayer to play with friends, and daily challenges will ensure to deliver endless amount of fun. Try Slizza on-the-go and watch out not to get (too) addicted. 
 
- Fun and relaxing gameplay 
- 100+ single player levels 
- Play the competitive multiplayer with friends or online 
- Amazing graphics and sounds 
- Choose between swipe and tap for play mode 
- Unlimited use of batteries

name: Slime Squisher
summary: Sime Squisher is a game where you need to protect a strawberry by squishing slimes. Choose upgrades, get more powerful and survive waves of deadly slimes!

name: Slay the Demon Queen
summary: When the Demon Queen who brought peace is cursed and about to destroy the world, it's up to the chosen hero from another world to plow her hard enough to satisfy her sexual cravings—WAIT, WHAT?!

name: Slime Girl Smoothies
summary: Prepare to see a lot of jugs while mixing up some very wacky drinks in this Slime Girl bar puzzle!

name: Slam 'n Jam '96 Featuring Magic & Kareem
summary:
Get ready to take it to the hole with Magic Johnson and Kareem Abdul Jabbar in Slam 'N Jam '96: featuring Magic & Kareem! Featuring fully rendered 3D arenas, players can execute the ever-famous sky-hook, pull off no-look passes, view instant replays for spectacular plays, and set up all kinds of offensive and defensive strategies. Additionally, Van Earl Wright returns as the play-by-play commentator!

Slam 'N Jam '96 features a few gameplay options including the Exhibition Game, Season, and Playoffs modes. The Exhibition is a single game of basketball using any of the teams. This is ideal for new players as it will get them accustomed to the gameplay mechanics and various controls. On the other hand, starting a new Playoffs session will save you the time and hassle of going through an actual season of basketball. Choose your favorite team and guide them to the finals!

name: SlimeCraft
summary: SlimeCraft is a 2.5D crafting roguelike where the player mines objects, gathers resources, and crafts items to defend themself against waves of enemies in order to continue their journey exploring new worlds as a blue slime.

name: Slime Legion
summary:
The peaceful monster forest was invaded by the dreadful heroes!
Become a valiant great devil.
Protect the peace of the forest!
Merge your monsters!
Set your favorite lineup!
Protect your castle!
Wipe out all invaders!

name: Slab
summary: Slab is an arcade game in which the main task is destroy slabs and bricks. The player controls a horizontally moving paddle to ricochet the ball against the slabs and destroy them. Slab has very precision paddle! If you like classic childhood games, check it out!

name: Slime 3K: Rise Against Despot
summary: The goo used to artificially grow humans has become self-aware and risen up against its creator! Devour humans, grow weapons from your body, fight against everything, and challenge the Despot himself!

name: Slayer Shock
summary:
Slayer Shock is a role-playing shooter about hunting vampires in Nebraska.

Operating from your headquarters at a college coffee shop, you take missions to patrol the streets, rescue captive humans, and weaken the undead threat. A team of fellow vampire slayers assists you from HQ, providing new weapons, skills, and research.

Slayer Shock blends immersive first-person action, lightweight strategy, and procedural narrative into a uniquely thrilling experience.

name: Slime-ing
summary: In 'Sliming, players must navigate the slime through numerous obstacles to reach its destination by bouncing it. The control of avoiding obstacles such as spikes, saw blades, and moving platforms creates a thrilling experience for players.

name: Slam: Shaq vs. The Legends
summary: With Pick Up, the player can create a single match. After choosing a location he / she can pick the players for both teams. Most slots on the select are reserved for custom players. If there's no player on the slot, a player called PLAY H will appear as placeholder. Each Location has a few special players, which can be just selected there. Also, after pressing the select changes and gives the player the possibility to choose a profi character. A Tournament works similar to Pick Up. The differences are that you just can choose players for your team and can't pick profi players. After selection a overview with the different matches will be shown. The goal is to survive the tournament and beat all rival teams.Slam features a Editor in which you can create your own players. On the first screen you can name your character and change his look. Similar to RPGs you can give 90 points to different abilities, which have influence on how the player will behave in-game. Finally you can choose a hometown for your character to complete it. In case you don't like the default slam, you can give every custom player own. On the first screen you can select which ranges slam you want to edit and test it. If the selected player can't jump high (has an UPS value of 11 and lower), he can just dunk in range 1, otherwise in 2 also.

name: Slime Drop
summary: A cute Suika type game but with slimes.

name: Slime Rule
summary: A monster suddenly appeared, took over Uzacan castle. It destroyed a series of the world's top heroes, caused a worldwide uproar. The most shocking fact is that it's just a small slime.

name: Slam Tennis
summary:
Slam Tennis goes where no tennis game has gone before - this is liquid tennis with attitude. A game that recreates then amplifies the excitement, atmosphere and challenge of modern professional tennis. In Slam Tennis overcoming your opponent is only part of the challenge.

Two different extremes of tennis are combined here. The four Grand Slam venues are among the 11 featured, but so are a mansion and a dance hall. These surfaces all affect ball speed and bounce. A few real players such as Carlos Moya and Tim Henman are included, but most are created for the game - a lifeguard and a mayor are included, with abilities based on their real-life work.

As well as playing individual Exhibition matches, you can take on an Arcade challenge of defeating the 16 players or take on the full Slam Tennis Championship event. Forehand, backhand and lob shots are all available. There are also sub-games: Crazy Collapsing Columns, Bubble Bursting Bonanza, Rocking Ring Riot, and Sand, Sea and Serve,

name: Slotracers VR
summary: Slotracers VR is a full slotracing experience built for VR. Race miniature cars against your friends on race tracks created by yourself, your friends or the community. Build your own tracks together with your friends and share them on the Steam Workshop for other people to enjoy.

name: Slimewest
summary: Face off against an invasion of slimes in this 2D roguelite with pixel art graphics. Play alone or with up to 4 friends and save the city from the devouring attack of these creatures. Get your weapon ready and embark on this bang bang western style adventure. Play now and prove your mettle!

name: Slime Climb: A Count Pumpcula Tale
summary: Bounce, Jump and Slide your way out of The Abyss. It's time to Slime Climb!

name: Slendrina Remake
summary: Slendrina Remake is a scary survival game set in a dungeon where you must gather items, solve puzzles, and evade the sinister Slendrina herself to make it out alive. Experience the atmosphere of fear and tension in this gripping horror adventure.

name: Slime Attack: Survivor
summary: Fast-paced arena roguelike bullet heaven! Battle relentless waves, tackle mid-run challenges, unlock unique heroes with their own combat pets, equip powerful gear, weapons, and spells, and take on mighty Yonian bosses.

name: Slime Sexy Party
summary: This is an adventure game set in a fantasy world without the concept of time, telling the story of a player rescuing his wife from the hands of monsters. In the game, players will embark on a thrilling adventure by operating their brainpower, intelligence and other aspects.

name: Slave Zero X
summary: Slave Zero X is a stylish 2.5D character action game set in the biopunk world of Slave Zero (1999). Run & Slash your way through a dystopian future in this character action game which will resonate with fans of Devil May Cry, Strider, and Guilty Gear.

name: Slap Fight
summary: A.L.C.O.N (Allied League of Cosmic Nations), also known as Slap Fight, is a vertically scrolling shooter developed by Toaplan.

name: Slendrina Must Die: The Forest
summary:
Slendrina Must Die: The Forest is a fantastic first-person shooter with horror elements. You must uncover the sinister and strange Slendrina who lives within a dark and mysterious forest with her mother and children.

You must explore the forest and locate seven keys that will help you complete the mission and unlock the dark secrets surrounding this woman.

Game is based on Slendrina: The Forest

name: Slick Racing Game
summary: Equip your car and engage in battle, show everyone that you're the best player in the field. Cooperate with other players, create your own clan and fight for new territories. Go to the races and bring items. You can use them to upgrade your weapons or to create the better ones.

name: Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 6
summary: In Slenderman Must Die: Industrial Waste, you'll navigate terrifying and surreal industrial landscapes as you play a soldier lost in the chaos of war. Immerse yourself in the eerie silence as you work to find 9 vital notes that provide a way out. But beware of the lurking presence, Slenderman. This game combines elements of survival, horror, and first-person shooter gameplay for an unforgettable gaming experience.

name: Slavic Winter Simulator
summary: Slavic Winter Simulator is an authentic experience that recreates the celebration of New Year among residents of the post-Soviet space in the 2000s, offering nostalgic emotions. Throw snowballs at your in-game friends, enjoy the magical atmosphere of New Year from the 2000s, and relive the carefree days of childhood.

name: Slime Princess
summary: Slime Princess is a pixel style stand-alone game that combines platform action, dungeon exploration and Roguelike elements. Players will play the role of a heroic slime and embark on a challenging adventure in order to save the slime princess who has been kidnapped by evil forces.

name: Sleep Herd
summary: Explore, collect, fight, and light your way through a dark and dreamy wonderland in this 2-4 player resource management campaign!

name: Sleeping Forest
summary: Hey there, Legends! Dive into "Sleeping Forest" – where you lead a ragtag squad on a perma-death quest for glory! Round up buddies for local co-op, solve puzzles, and shape epic tales. It's medieval mayhem with a side of romance!

name: Slime Quest
summary: A colorful adventure of a small green slug in a fairy-tale country.

name: Slime Farm
summary: Dive into Slime Farm Simulator, where you'll play with, and care for the Cutest magical slimes ever seen! Watch as they Evolve in whimsical ways, strategically manage their Elements and moods, and expand your enchantingly cute slime farm.

name: Slime Mori-mori Dragon Quest: Shougeki no Shippo-dan
summary: Slime Mori-mori Dragon Quest: Shougeki no Shippo-dan is a Japanese action-adventure video game published by Square Enix in 2003 for Game Boy Advance.

name: Slide Stars
summary: It’s 2020, and Instagram, TikTok, and other social media platforms are where young people spend their day. Lion Castle brought all the leading influencers and role models of many countries together, reimagined them into Fortnite style visuals and put it all together in an already-proven game concept.

name: Slipways
summary:
Turn desolate planets into a vast trade empire. Hatch plans. Research game-breaking technologies. Still be done in time for lunch. Enjoy the endless possibilities of a space grand strategy game in 60 minutes flat.

Slipways takes the space grand strategy genre and condenses the best parts of it down by throwing away all the micromanagement and the steep learning curve. The result is a game in which you can finish a run quickly, but still have a deep experience full of important decisions.

Forget about tedious micromanagement and spending time waiting for ships to build. In Slipways, every action you take has immediate consequences, and every choice you make is of paramount importance. Your planets govern themselves while you focus on making the right decisions to get them what they need. You'll waste none of your precious time on busywork - a single run takes 40-60 minutes and they are all filled with the good stuff.

name: Slide Furry
summary: Be a good boy and enjoy this puzzle game with sexy furry girls.

name: Slendrina: The Cellar
summary:
Slendrina: The Cellar is a first-person horror game that challenges you to try to escape from Slendrina (the female and equally scary version of the mythical Slenderman).

Game was made originally for mobile devices (exclusive to the Google Play Store), but has an official PC Port you can find on Gamejolt.

name: Sleeping Dogs: Year of the Snake
summary:
It is the eve of Chinese New Year, and Cultists have emerged to cleanse the city of Hong Kong so that they will earn their salvation after what they believe will be the end of the world. Earn back your honor in the HKPD by sabotaging the cultist plot across six new missions set after the original Sleeping Dogs story.

Please note there is no Russian language support available for this content. When installed, Russian subtitles and all other game text in Sleeping Dogs appears in English."

name: Slenderman's Shadow
summary:
Slenderman's Shadow is a series of playable maps created (8th Oct 2012) by Marc Steene and Wray Burgess, and later (13th Jan 2013), as a full remake, a survival horror game, based on Slender: The Eight Pages by Parsec Productions.

The series' original website is no longer active. Marc Steene has since reuploaded the Unity remake, completely free, on a new itch.io page.

name: Slime Trials
summary: A fast-paced, precision platformer where you dash, jump, and build momentum to soar through dangerous levels. Crush the speedrun clock or take your time to collect all the valuable gems and unlock hats for your slime.

name: Slender Man Origins 3: Abandoned School
summary:
The long-awaited sequel to the major hit games Slender Man Origins 1 & 2.
Introducing Slender Man Origins 3: Abandoned School.

name: Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 3
summary: Slenderman Must Die: Silent Forest is the third episode of the Slenderman Must Die series from Poison Games.

name: Slime Rancher 2
summary: Continue the adventures of Beatrix LeBeau as she journeys across the Slime Sea to Rainbow Island, a land brimming with ancient mysteries, and bursting with wiggly, new slimes to wrangle in this sequel to the smash-hit, Slime Rancher.

name: Slit Mouthed
summary: Slit Mouthed is a first-person horror adventure game based on a Japanese myth. The gameplay focuses on storytelling, stealth and decision making, there are also some puzzles for the player to solve, making gameplay more various.

name: Slimekeep
summary: In a world becoming corrupted by the evil Slime King, KILL or CAPTURE various slimes to grow stronger and save Slimetopia! Venture through procedurally generated levels in this fast-paced roguelike, if you're tough enough to not get slimed...

name: Slender: Adrift
summary:
Yes! This is just another Slender Man rip off.

But my friend challenged me to make a slender game. In 4 days. This forest was what I came up with (yes I used Models from my previous games).

What I am planning on Doing is for this game to be inspired by the game Slender man : Shadows.

name: Slimey Champions
summary: Slimey Champions is all about hacking and slashing. Get loot, level up and learn new skills in this solo indie made action rpg.

name: Slave Princess Finne: If Story 1
summary: It is the story of Finne's - what if? The human route and the elven route are included

name: Slapshot: Rebound
summary:
Slapshot Rebound is a physics-based multiplayer game where you play an arcade style match of hockey. No shoot button, no puck glue, no RNG.

It’s up to you and your team to take control of the puck, rotate your stick to pass, shoot, outplay your opponents. Score the most goals before time runs out to win.

name: Slide!
summary: Slide! is a puzzle game where you control a happy boy and have to defeat your arch-enemy Angry Man. It features 13 levels, each harder than the last, and was made for the Game Jaaj 7 game jam.

name: Slingbot Survivors
summary: Slingbot Survivors is a survivor-like auto-shooter with physics-based platforming. Explore a hostile alien planet, use your grappling hook to zip around, and wield an arsenal of powerful weapons & gadgets to wipe out hordes of alien horrors!

name: Slender: Lonely Home
summary: Slender - Lonely Home is inspired by Slender: Slender: The Eight Pages, but with modern graphic, dynamic environment, interactable objects and a scary & dark ambience.

name: Slotomancer
summary: Battle wizards in this roguelike slot-battler! Spin the board to cast spells, summon creatures, and unleash powerful combos. Build your deck, unlock artifacts, and ascend through 15 unique wizard encounters. Every spin is a strategic decision!

name: Slayaway Camp
summary:
"Slayaway Camp is a killer puzzle game in which the player controls Skullface, a psychotic slasher bent on revenge. The adorable murderer slides around colourful isometric puzzle designs decapitating, squashing, and perforating blocky teenaged victims.

GAME FEATURES
- 10 gut-wrenching “videotapes,” plus deleted scenes, for over 200 puzzle levels
- Traps! Cops! SWAT teams! Land mines! Rotary telephones! Cats!
- Unlock the NC-17 mode on all movies for even more puzzle insanity (+ censored shower scenes)
- Starring Mark Meer (Cdr. Shepard from Mass Effect) as “Skullface” and Derek Mears (Jason from Friday the 13th) as “Jessica”
- Unlock multiple psycho killers, including ones based on cult horror movies such as “American Mary”
- Discover dozens of spectacular “Gore-Pak” kill scenes featuring wood-chippers, lawnmowers, Sumerian demon incantations, and more!
- Genuine hair-metal soundtrack by legendary Canadian group GNÜ TRUNTION"

name: Sliding Blaster 2
summary: A top-down shooter game for SNES, with mouse controls.

name: Slasher's Keep
summary:
You have been imprisoned and left to rot in the depths of Slasher's Keep, a frightful construct towering above the forgotten forest in the remotest wilds of Ool. As rulers came and went the keep remained the final destination for the nation's most undesirable elements. Many a scoundrel has tried and failed to escape its dungeons, perilous as they are. Will you share their fate, or will you overcome the challenges ahead involving the features below?

Hack, slash, shoot and loot your way through procedurally generated dungeons! Smack your enemies into spikes with your inventory sack!

name: Sleeping Dogs
summary: Wei Shen, an young officer working for the San Francisco Police Department gets tasked to go back to his hometown of Hong Kong. In Hong Kong Wei is assigned to the Hong Kong Police Department, in a effort to take down the "Sun on Yee" Wei goes undercover in the triad to gather information and take them down, But the police soon become worried that he is getting attached to his "Friends" such as Jackie Ma. In this journey of Betrayal and High stakes, Will Wei become a "Red Pole" and join the high ranks of the Triads or be discovered by them and buried alive?

name: Slime Tower
summary: Slime Tower is a bright and cute 3D platformer game. Various traps and enemies are waiting for you. Collect various collectibles and reach the top of the tower.

name: Slobbish Dragon Princess 3
summary: Peace has more or less returned as humankind and dragonkind learn to coexist with each other. With the town summer festival approaching soon, Takeru would prefer that things stay the way they are. As expected, a new threat approaches in the form of Mei, the dragon princess of the Nether!

name: Sledgehammer
summary:
The player takes over the role of Jack Hammer or more specifically his truck either in a 3rd-person- or cockpit-view. The truck has the ability to transform itself into to two configurations: combat mode and race mode. In race mode the truck has access to it's boosters, allowing it to speed up fast. Once the player has installed the upgrade, he can also plant mines in race mode. Combat mode instead activates the three weapons systems: main, secondary and melee. By successfully completing the missions and also by earning gold medals, the player unlocks additional upgrades for his truck. These can either enhance his performance like better boosters, change his look or are improvements like a rocket launcher or circular saws on the side for his combat mode.

The game is divided into six episodes with several missions that either advance the storyline or are just there to unlock new upgrades. The missions themselves are roughly divided into twelve game modes although especially the final missions of each episode often combine several game modes into one. Not every game mode let's the player drive his truck though. While there are normal races, in which the player can also use his weapons to get rid of the competition, or arena missions in which only survival counts - in "Transporting" the player for example needs to take a really big truck and get it from point A to B while in "Bomb Car" the player only drives a small vehicle outfitted with a bomb.

The game also features a multiplayer-mode for up to eight players but limited to LAN. In addition the only available game-modes in multiplayer are "Arena" and "Race".

name: Slot Shots Pinball: Ultimate Edition
summary: Get ready for some good 'ol fashion pinball fun with eleven tables ready for you! Bigger playfields, better physics, longer soundtracks, and more slot machine shots! Prepare yourself for the ultimate edition of Slot Shots Pinball featuring four unreleased tables along with some classics.

name: Slender: The Eight Pages
summary:
Slender (known as Slender: The Eight Pages as of v0.9.7) is an independently-developed concept game based on the Slender Man mythos. The game centers around an unknown character being stalked and chased by the Slender Man within the woods while seeking eight pages scattered about various landmarks.

The game was created by Mark J. Hadley as an experiment. The experiment proved to be a success, and Slender gained mass amounts of popularity after going viral. It can be downloaded for free from Hadley's website.

name: Slayers X: Terminal Aftermath - Vengance of the Slayer
summary: So.... got what it takes to be a X Slayer?!?... 7 weapons, blood and gore, twisted music by Seepage & Psyko Syndikate, and maps where you can blow up everything. its awesome. started making it in 1998 in high school with my friend and now im 37, so i have life experience now.

name: Slice of Life
summary:
Experience a twisting narrative filled with interesting friends and foes. Slice of Life features fast-paced arcade-style tennis action, a deep perk-based customization system and many
character driven storylines and social links. With tons of Sub-Games and several local multiplayer modes, you'll have a packed semester at Rosegate University.

name: Sled Riders
summary: Discover incredible winter sled races on exciting tracks against other racers!

name: Slenderman Must Run
summary: Slenderman Must Run is an Android game developed by Poison Games. It is a free arcade game that falls into the endless runner category. In this game, you have to run, dash, jump, and slide to avoid traps and stay alive. While running, you need to collect pages to move on to the next level.

name: Slipstream 5000
summary: Take over control of one of many futuristic racers which fly through courses all over the world. A very nice feature is the ability of picking up weapons during fight to keep your opponents under control. You're able to upgrade your racer after every track.

name: Slay the Berserker
summary: Slay The Berserker: A solo developer's 3D hack and slash dark fantasy game with 2000's retro style. Find your path with stylish platforming movements as you slay enemies in half. Face challenging bosses across diverse biomes in your quest to Slay The Berserker.

name: Slime Guy
summary: Slime Guy is a 2D rogue-lite dungeon-crawler where you enter as Puddles. A seemingly weak slime whose family has been kidnapped and taken into the I-Valley. Do you have what it takes to save your family?

name: Slime Roll
summary:
Our game, developed for the Mini Jam, embraces the theme of Fusion and incorporates the required limitation of "Control the Environment." In this fast-paced and creative adventure, players will dive into a world where the fusion of objects and abilities takes center stage.

As the player explores various levels, they will encounter unique objects and elements that can be fused together to create powerful synergies. With the ability to control the environment, players can manipulate and combine these objects to overcome obstacles and navigate through challenging puzzles.

To navigate the game world, players will utilize the classic WASD controls for movement, providing a smooth and intuitive experience. Additionally, they will harness the power of fusion through the use of special abilities. Pressing the spacebar allows the character to perform a dynamic jump, while the Q key activates a heavy ability with tremendous impact. For explosive situations, players can unleash the fused power by pressing the E key.

Our game truly embodies the theme of Fusion by emphasizing the combination of objects and abilities to overcome obstacles and solve puzzles. With the limitation of "Control the Environment," players are encouraged to think creatively and strategically to manipulate their surroundings and forge their path to victory.

Join us in this thrilling adventure, where fusion and environmental control are the keys to success. Can you master the art of fusion and conquer the challenges that lie ahead? Get ready to experience a game that pushes the boundaries of creativity and control in the Mini Jam!

name: Slither Loop
summary: Slither Loop - draw lines between the dots to form a single loop without crossings or branches. The numbers indicate how many lines surround it. - 90 challenging puzzles, Easy/Medium/Hard difficulties - Beautiful abstract artstyle - Chill background music

name: Sleepwalker
summary: Lee is having a restless night - sure he's fast asleep, but that won't stop him taking one of his nocturnal journeys! Fortunately, our sleepwalker has a courageous canine companion who will try his utmost to protect his master from coming to any harm; Lee's faithful mutt, Ralph.

name: Slave Princess Finne: If Story 2
summary: It is Finne's story - What if Finne had taken on a certain mission for the Water Kingdom? contains the mission plot of the guardian pig prince!

name: Slime Town
summary: "Slime Town" is a fantasy world that can stay on your desktop! It allows you to leisurely collect resources and nurture companions during breaks from work or study! Here, you'll build a home with adorable slime companions, explore hidden realms, and create your unique adventure.

name: Slender's Woods
summary:
Slender's Woods is a short horror game about a mythical creature Slender man. Of course, the game is inspired by the famous Slender game by Parsec Productions, but it has a different type of gameplay.

The Gamejolt release contains some fixes and extra polishing.

name: Slayaway Camp 2
summary:
Remember Skullface, the extremely malicious masked killer from Blue Wizard’s 2016 cult hit Slayaway Camp? Well, some random campers made the mistake of summoning him from beyond the grave, and now he’s trapped inside a very familiar-looking streaming service. That means hundreds of potential new victims splattered across classic movie genres. And they’re not going to decapitate themselves, are they?

Step into Skullface’s blood-soaked boots or choose from a murderous lineup of horror heavyweights like Gourd Head, the Killer Fridge, and Demon Doll. This gruesomely funny tribute to ‘80s horror invites you to perfect the art of the scare. Maneuver through sliding block logic puzzles, find hiding spots, collect secret bonus machetes and unleash grisly finishers to elevate your kills and escalate your score.

Rack up star ratings to unlock an expanding horror universe packed with new genres, settings, slayers and stunts as you guide Skullface on his murderous media mission!

name: Slime Research
summary: Slimy Puzzle Platforming

name: Slice, Suffer, Serve!
summary: Slice, Suffer, Serve! is a 2D slice-and-click game where you play as a chef, preparing dishes for ghost customers. Sell as many dishes as possible and try not to let the customers get angry! What are you waiting for, new employee? Serve spooky dishes to ghostly guests—quickly!!!

name: Sludge Life 2
summary: Big Mud is missing! Everyone's favourite rapping frog has vanished, and his closest homie Ghost (that's you) is on a mission to find him. Sludge Life 2 whisks you away to Ciggy City Suites, a luxurious multi-floor hotel heaving with secrets, gadgets, gags, peculiar characters, and ugly corporate architecture to make over with your spray can.

name: Slime Saga
summary: Train slimes, make friends, and get set for adventure! It's time to pick up your slime catcher and become the latest and greatest tamer!

name: Slot Heroes: Reels of Fate
summary: A fantasy RPG where slot reels decide your strategy. With 243 paylines, spin the reels to unleash your heroes’ skills. Trust in luck or control the board — journey with allies and carve out your destiny!

name: Sleeping Tanuki
summary: Let the Tanuki to sleep! for Mobware Minigames for the Panic Playdate.

name: Slashbang
summary:
Slashbang aims to be the fastest paced FPS around. Inspired by the likes of Jet Set Radio and Sonic Adventure, there's a distinct 50/50 split between movement and combat.

There's lots of movement abilities and lots of tech, including dodging, drifting, and the ability to run up walls. Props are also fully destructible and can be sliced to pieces with Flynn's claws, as well are enemies! There's also a focus on story - the full game will be akin to a mix of Scott Pilgrim and Metal Gear.

name: Slowly Sliding Ducks
summary: Stay afloat and navigate challenging waterpark rides against up to 16 online players. Spray water, slide, score, and aim to become the pool's most distinguished duck!

name: Slime Dreamscape
summary: Slime Dreamscape is a 2D pixel-style puzzle casual game. The core mechanic of the game is that elements of the same color can interact with each other. Players need to cleverly use various items to help the slime successfully eat the cake.

name: Sleeping Dragon
summary: Sleeping Dragon is an adventure puzzle game. In Sleeping Dragon, you need to explore small diorama levels, find 7 totems and unravel the mysteries behind the Sleeping Dragon's secrets. Sleeping Dragon is a 3D Platformer, full of puzzles and challenges and a lot of collectables.

name: Slip
summary: Slip is a fast paced side scrolling platformer featuring a two color, swap mechanic. Using your two colors flee from Steve and his wretched purple beam through a multitude of obstacles and enemies. Slip combines the elegant simplicity of platforming with a polarity mechanic to create an easy to learn, but extremely difficult to master platforming experience. Simply put, Slip is the real deal.

name: Slam City with Scottie Pippen: Respect Edition
Sleepy Girl
summary:
A mostly autobiographical retelling of my mornings.

This games comes with footnotes, have "footnotes.txt" open while playing.

Mild flashing lights warning.

name: Slime Knight
summary: Slime Knight is Pixel-Art Side-Scrolling Puzzle Game That Slime Get into the armor and go on an adventure

name: Slendrina: The Forest
summary:
Slendrina: The Forest is the ninth game in the Slendrina Series.

The player needs to be to reveal the secret of the forest, while Slendrina and her mother are hunting you down.

name: Slime Changer
summary: A slime with no memory of who—or what—it is. Absorb others, wield their powers, and embark on a journey to save the world and discover your true identity. Experience fast-paced, stylish action in a brutal yet beautiful dystopia where magic and machines collide.

name: Slam Dunk: SD Heat Up!!
summary: An anime license basketball sim, developed by TOSE and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Slime Battle
summary: Slime Battle is a meat-puppet survival game. You need to control the slime to continuously upgrade during the battle, unlock more spells, items, and attribute enhancements, and ultimately defeat the powerful enemies to win the game.

name: Sleep
summary: Nastya, she is 18 years old. Every day she draws images of the monsters that come to her and describes them. And every night, Nastya has a dream where she fights her monsters. And with each dream, you have to get out of the dream.

name: Slider Scouts
summary:
Your lone Slider Scout is late for camp, and needs help recruiting more scouts for his troop at the Scout Lodge. Swipe to send this miniature burger on a massive adventure through the uncharted forest, where there are new surprises around every corner! Scouts will keep sliding until they bump into a wall blocking their way, so you'll need to guide him on a route through the wilderness. Keep swiping to send him in different directions, and try to reach the exit so your slider can continue his travels and scout out the next area.

New puzzling paths await you at every turn! Traps, blocks, and baddies are scattered across the land, and you'll have to keep sliding to find the best path through all of the obstacles. Watch out for spike traps, cannons, and condiment baddies that try to slide in your way.

Don't worry if you get hurt while exploring! You'll be sent back to the Scout Lodge, where the points you've collected go towards earning a new Rank for your scout troop. When you level up, you can earn extra coins, prizes, discover new locations, and even recruit new slider scouts for your troop!

Use your collected coins to awaken the Great Slider Shrine, where you have a chance to summon and collect new scouts to add to your troop! All of your scouts will stay in the Scout Lodge, and you can switch between any of your playable scouts before heading out on the trail.

name: Slimeboo
summary: Boo, a small and adorable slime, has gotten lost on a tropical island. To find his way home, he must leap over all the obstacles in his path. Help him overcome them! Good luck!

name: Slender Space
summary: Slender Space is a small indie game created by Ricky Murray (AKA RickkMurray), with the help of Pete Levonpera. It’s based off Slender: The Eight Pages and the Dead Space series. The game features, in-game cinematic as well as creepy sound design and jump scares.

name: Slap the Rocks
summary: Slap The Rocks is a new top-down puzzle which will push your brain to the limit. Slap rocks, avoid bushes and flee from stumps! Can you smash your way to the final level? Many levels of complexity! 20 unlocked levels to explore. You choose! Many ways to complete the same puzzle. Beautiful pixel graphics. Captivating and interesting puzzles. The controls are simple and accessible.

name: Slobbish Dragon Princess
summary: After discovering a strange, lizard-like being on the side of the road, things start to change for Takeru. And wouldn’t you know it, that lizard was actually the princess of the dragons! Now begins their bizarre, yet down to earth daily life.

name: SlipSlop
summary: One button platformer nightmare

name: Slime Climb
summary: A challenging precision platformer that will test your determination. Climb an unforgiving mountain filled with tricky platforms and treacherous gaps as you yearn for Tasty Snacks at the summit. Every fall hurts, but victory tastes sweet.

name: Sleeping Valley
summary:
Sleeping Valley - a new arcade platformer game

In Sleeping Valley you only have one life to live and it's your job to see how far you can take this cute character on his brutally hard journey.

name: Slippery Flippers: Episode One - Amulet of the Gods
summary: A group of thieves have found their next gig: a museum holding the "Amulet of the Gods," a mysterious artifact said to contain godlike power inside of it. It's sitting there, just asking to be stolen. With law enforcement on the prowl, will the crew's leader, Orlando, lead them to riches or ruin?

name: Sly Spy
summary: It is an action arcade game released by Data East in 1989, and is inspired by the James Bond movie franchise.

name: Sleeping Dogs: The SWAT Pack
summary: Patrol the streets in an armored SWAT van and respond to multiple emergency situations across Hong Kong. Kit yourself out in a full-bodied SWAT outfit to conceal your identity and withstand twice as much damage.

name: Slayer Cat
summary: Slayer Cat is a classic action shooter game that combines hand-drawn drawings with classic gameplay. Inspired by games like Contra, Doom, and Cuphead. Play as The Slayer Cat as you traverse strange places on an enemy planet, and discover and discover the mysteries of this place!

name: Sleengster 2
summary:
Years have passed since our hero Sleengster has defeated the Tikkirama for the first time. But the enemy is regrouping. 
 
Betrayal and anger has led to the regrowth of the Tikkirama Organisation and all Sleengpeople are in danger.

name: Slice Night 3: Slicer of the 7 Dreams
summary: Slice Night 3 is a graceful yet challenging melee platformer about the beauty of dreams and processing of repressed emotion; a power fantasy with some truth sprinkled in.

name: Slender: A Crooked Manifestation
summary: Slender - A Crooked Manifestation is a single player horror game, in which after surviving the boat crash, you explore eerie islands and dark caves as you try to survive the lurking Slenderman. Can you uncover a secret with the help of a missing companion from your past without becoming HIS victim?

name: Slicy Flips
summary: Slicing is so easy and the pleasure is real.

name: Slug Fling
summary: Slug Fling is an action platformer inspired by the retro classics of the run-and-gun genre with modern enhancements. Help Team STAR to victory by carrying Slug across the solar system, and stop the threat to the Astropod!

name: SlabWell: The Quest For Kaktun's Alpaca
summary: Somewhere deep in the Amazon jungle, lies the finest treasure mankind has ever crafted: The Jade Alpaca. Professional thief duo Sam and Jacky head off on an adventure to recover the mythical artifact, determined to solve the riddles and overcome the challenges that have kept it safe through centuries. An original puzzle adventure: Put your mind to test as you explore Kaktun’s pyramid, where you’ll find over 100 handcrafted levels full of traps, enigmas and a host of new mechanics with every step. A brothers tale: Follow the story of Sam and Jacky in their dream to become the world’s wealthiest thieves, as they face their worst fears in their hardest heist yet. Cooperative mode: Join forces with friends and family to solve custom cooperative levels, where communication will be your most valuable tool. An engaging journey: Explore the wonders of a long lost temple, from its corridors reclaimed by nature to its majestic treasure chambers, accompanied by the game’s beautiful soundtrack.

name: Slenderman: Lost Children
summary: Play what people are calling "quite possibly the scariest mobile game" and "finally a game worthy of the Slenderman mythos". Can you find your child!? Is it too late? Is he another lost soul and victim of Slenderman? Only you will know when you follow your child's clues to find him.

name: Slay and Spray Exterminators
summary: Play as a newly-spawned Exterminator, custom built to safely capture the grievous enemies of humanity. Upgrade your arsenal by completing missions to unlock a wide variety of new equipment to help you with your holy task; of course, a new cosmetic every now and then couldn't hurt too, right?

name: Slot Waste
summary: An episode-length first-person factory simulation. Navigate through a series of 10 unique and weird mini-games. What are you producing and who are you making it for?

name: Slimepocalypse
summary: Blast your way through oncoming hordes of slimes in this run and gun, slime blasting shoot 'em up! Arm yourself with an arsenal of futuristic weapons and defend your home as its invaded by a disgusting infestation of slime scum. Run, Blast, Survive! and whatever you do...DON'T GET SLIMED

name: Slashing Night
summary: "SLASHING NIGHT" is a hardcore action game developed by YUGIKOBO, paying tribute to high-speed action games such as Devil May Cry and Bayonetta, and trying its best to restore their operability. In the game, players can quickly switch weapons and perform air or ground combos.

name: Slay the Princess: The Pristine Cut - Special Edition
summary:
Slay the Princess – The Pristine Cut: Special Edition contains:

physical copy of the game
A3 keyart poster
soundtrack download card
swinging arm action acrylic standee
mirror sticker sheet
black & white optical illusion keychain
severed arm enamel pin
collector’s box

name: Slaves of Magic
summary: Slaves of Magic is a fantasy turn-based tactical RPG in which you have to lead the resistance against the invaders. You will have to find ways to slow down their forces, till you can learn their most powerful weapon, the use of elemental magic, and turn it against them.

name: Slugterra: Slug it Out!
summary: Slug it Out is a mobile game based on the Slugterra animated TV series. The core mechanic is match-3 style fast paced action to match tiles across the board.

name: Sleeper Cell
summary:
Play online with 5-10 players as you attempt to complete your tasks, but be on the look out as one - two of your fellow agents may be the Sleeper Cell.

Agent Objectives:
- Complete Tasks
- Discover and eliminate the Sleeper Cell
- Keep an eye on your fellow agents and watch for suspicious behavior
- Report dead bodies and meet up to discuss suspicions
- Call emergency meetings to discuss suspicious behavior

Sleeper Cell Objectives:
- Eliminate your fellow agents
- Pretend to complete your tasks to avoid suspicion
- Sabotage the facility to create chaos and division in the agency

Features
- Fully interactable Physics Environment
- Physics Puzzle Tasks
- In-Game VOIP Chat
- In-Game Custom Map Creation

name: Sleigh Strikers
summary: Santa's going high-tech with the Present Launcher 1225! Join the jolly ride, rescue reindeer, and blast presents down chimneys in this holly, jolly, fast paced shoot 'em up. Make every shot count and save Christmas in a dash!

name: Slugmouth
summary: SLUGMOUTH is an fps rpg where you explore a post-apocalyptic overworld from an overhead perspective, and fight through points of interest from a first person view. Bullets hit hard and survival demands careful resource management and tactical shooting.

name: Sliding Cubes 2048 Mania
summary: Merge, strategize, and conquer—reach 2048 in this addictive puzzle phenomenon!

name: Slime Garden
summary: Slime Garden is a contemplative game in which you explore a procedural world and meet its joyful inhabitants.

name: Slay or Fall
summary: The player takes on the burden of a dark dungeon lord. However, a squad of heroes has come to his lands and intend to defeat the player. The task of the dark lord: to kill, expel, break the heroes before they reach him. Throughout the game, the lord is in his throne room and influences events indirectly. However, it is through such undermining decisions that the heroes must be overcome. In addition, the political situation in the dungeon lands is extremely unstable. Of the 4 nations, only one favors the player, the rest have to be taken into account and solve pressing political problems.

name: Slice Overdrive
summary: Slice Overdrive is a precision platformer built on speed, control, and flawless execution. Carve through deadly player-built levels, claim leaderboard glory, and ride the retro-synth soundtrack as you chase that perfect run.

name: Slimes
summary:
Of the things that came with the arrival of an alien being, the weakest of all of them are the slimes. Nobody knows what exactly these things are, but, as weak as they are, nobody's succeeded in destroying one of the dungeons from which they spawn.

Julius Anderson, a modern day crusader, takes the job of eradicating one of these slime dens. Hired on to help him is, well, Julius refuses to learn his name, on account of him being "diseased" with magic, but he's a healer. Through teeth-clenched teamwork, can the duo reach the bottom floor and destroy the source of the slimes?

name: Slime 64
summary:
Slime 64 is a 3D collect-a-thon platformer inspired by retro classics!

Play as air, fire, water, and earth slimes, in any order you'd like, as they meet each other on their journey and combine their powers to save the world from the diabolical Wurltson and his ever-expanding robotic enterprise. The Golden Keys, and assorted Bells and Whistles, will unlock new worlds to explore as you amass your strength in numbers (and your pile of goodies).

name: Slave Zero X: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: Slave Zero X is a stylish 2.5D character action game set in the biopunk world of Slave Zero (1999). Run & Slash your way through a dystopian future in this character action game which will resonate with fans of Devil May Cry, Strider, and Guilty Gear.

name: Slenderman: Unbecoming
summary: Slenderman: Unbecoming is a new adaptation on Slenderman, the paranormal phenomenon. Slenderman: Unbecoming is a singleplayer horror game, based on the narrative of one lone protagonist, haunted by Slenderman.

name: Slide Viking
summary: Sharpen your axes and get ready to slide into adventure! In Slide Viking, every move matters as you glide across the grid, smash crates, and collect the treasure chests hidden throughout the kingdom. What starts as a simple journey quickly becomes a true test of logic and planning. You play as a bold viking whose mission is clear: gather every chest of gold the land has to offer. With continuous sliding movement, you’ll need to think several steps ahead, undo mistakes infinitely, and break obstacles that stand in your way. The puzzles grow trickier with each level, mixing clever layouts and satisfying “aha!” moments. The game features 30 handcrafted puzzles across two unique settings. Begin in the Village, a humble place of wood and earth where your skills are forged. Then, prove your worth inside the Castle, the richest and most fortified place in the realm, with stone walls and floors that raise the challenge. Whether you’re after a casual puzzle to relax with or a series of smart challenges to conquer, Slide Viking delivers a journey full of brains, treasure, and plenty of sliding fun.

name: Sloop
summary: A fast-paced, sea-faring, adventure where you’ll have to learn to turn. Brave the waters!

name: Slot & Dungeons
summary: "Slot & Dungeons” is a deck-building roguelite in which the placement of enemies and items on the floor changes depending on the slots. While developing your character, collect symbols along the way to enhance the contents of the slots and conquer the dungeon.

name: Slimy Timey
summary: Slimey Timey is a simple 2D platformer where you play as a slime that can jump and attach to walls. Jump, slide, avoid all the dangerous traps, reach the end, and get all the stars!

name: Slotter Chou Mania: Antonio Inoki ga Genki ni Suru Pachi-Slot Ki
summary: If you're playing a virtual slot machine video game on your PlayStation 3, it might as well be one that features popular professional wrestler Antonio Inoki, right?

name: Slime Brawly Brawl
summary: An early prototype, Slime Brawly Brawl exists to scratch an itch. An itch for a simple, fast paced platformer melee game like 90s kids might have played and loved growing up.

name: Slaughter
summary: Slaughter is a first person shooter for the Nintendo Entertainment System.

name: SlotCrawler
summary: A roguelite, deckbuilding, slot machine, dungeon crawler. Build up synergies in your slot machine & slaughter monsters.

name: Slendrina: The School
summary:
Slendrina: The School is seventh game in the Slendrina Series.

The player needs to find 8 fuses and along a Teddy while Slendrina tracks and hunts them down.

name: Slam and Roll
summary: Slam And Roll is true tribute to the frantic platform arcades games of the 90s, where intense gameplay and fast action are kings. Grab your stick, baseball bat, or best sports companion, solo or with a friend, and face off against the evil alien and their machines and save the world's best places.

name: Slender Man Origins 2: House of Slender
summary:
Back by popular demand! The most anticipated Slenderman game!
A new game from the authors of the award-winning Slender Man Origins.
Meet Slender Man Origins 2!

name: Slender Man Origins
summary: Slender Man Origins - Immerse yourself into the thick atmosphere of mystery and horror! Follow the Slender Man’s trail, become a witness to his horrific deeds and save the children from their inevitable doom.

name: Slaves of Rome
summary: "Slaves of Rome" is a new adult sex game with strong BDSM elements in development. This is an early preview of the game. Play a slave trainer in ancient Rome - buy slaves, teach them how you like to F#$k and sell them for profit.

name: Slaves of Rome
summary: "Slaves of Rome" is a new adult sex game with strong BDSM elements in development. This is an early preview of the game. Play a slave trainer in ancient Rome - buy slaves, teach them how you like to F#$k and sell them for profit.

name: Slay the Abyss
summary: Slay The Abyss is a deck-building roguelike game where you choose the events you will encounter, step by step, to regain lost power. Time waits for no one — Try your best in the Action Time Battles. Seize every opportunity, make quick decisions, and slaughter hordes of enemies in the abyss.

name: Slipgate
summary: Explore a gloomy rooms of damned sci-fi base as a doomed marine, only survivor of the portal experiment. Save humanity like in 90's with your trusty shotgun, paving a way through ominous corridors inhabited by the shadows of sinners and evil spirits.

name: Sleight of Hand
summary: Infiltrate a hardboiled, rain-slicked city of taboo, where ritual magic and cursed artefacts set apart those with power from those without. Sleight of Hand is a 3rd-person Stealth-Action Deckbuilder about taking down the coven you used to run with.

name: Slideshot 2
summary:
New challenging levels of puzzle hit Slideshot (Top-100 in over 39 countries in 2009!)
Inspired by the likes of Rush Hour, Parking Lot and other sliding and pipe connecting puzzle games, Slideshot takes the traffic around the next bend: Move various tiles into a position that allows you to shoot a puck from one end of the game area to the other without missing any of the present pieces. It's easy to grasp – so join in the fun and exercise your brain!

name: Slime Slam
summary: A classic take on match 4 puzzle games from the 90's. With 4 gameplay modes and local multiplayer, this fast-paced challenging puzzler will keep you on your toes! Highly customizable options for any style of play.

name: Slumpunk
summary: Online multiplayer third person shooter game in the Cyberpunk realm. Fascinating cityscapes, futuristic weapons, Cyberpunk characters. It's all in this sweet polygon style game.

name: Slenderman History: WWII Faceless Horror
summary: In Slenderman History: WWII Faceless Horror, you're plunged into a sinister World War II environment, where the Nazis are conducting nefarious experiments. The aim? Creating a super soldier and summoning Slenderman through the use of an ancient artifact.

name: Slots Man
summary: This is a fantastical slot machine journey. In this strategy-building roguelite game, you'll engage in life-and-death gambles, discover talents that can change the tide, and rely on a touch of luck to return to the normal world.

name: Slide-A-Lama
summary:
Slide-A-Lama is a two player 2D strategy/puzzle game. The goal is to collect most points by matching at least three tiles of the same type in a five-by-five grid. Players take turns to insert their current tile in one of the rows or columns. If a column is full, the bottom most tiles is crushed, if a row is full, tile falls at the opposite end out of the grid. Once three or more tiles of a kind form a line, the player is awarded points depending on type and number of tiles. With each 60 points of difference between the two players, one of the ten lamas switches the side. The game ends once the first player has all the lamas on their side.

The game became popular as a flash game ICQ users could play against their contacts. It later appeared on several mobile platforms and as a website.

name: Slot or Not
summary: Deck-building turn-based slot machine battling adventure. Fight evil fruits aside your battle buddy slot machine to save your village. Spin your destiny and grab the precious loot in a fast paced colorful adventure.

name: Slop Fest
summary: An incremental horroresque game about feeding a gluttonous beast! Feed it slop, upgrade, repeat!

name: Slavoj Zizek Makes A Twine Game
summary: A Twine game about the divisive philosopher creating a game in Twine.

name: Slayers Wonderful
summary: Slayers Wonderful is a role-playing video game developed by TamTam and released by Banpresto for the PlayStation in 1998 exclusively in Japan. It features key voice actors from the Slayers anime versions and a story supervised by the Slayers author Hajime Kanzaka. The game was a big commercial success but received mixed critical reception.

name: Slayers Royal
summary: Slayers Royal is a tactical RPG featuring characters from the novel / manga / anime Slayers. It brings together for the first time Naga and Lina's companions, who never meet in the animated series.

name: Slimg
summary: Slimg is a Metroidvania game. Slimg left this mysterious planet to repair the crashed spaceship and embark on a magical adventure

name: Slime Siege
summary: Slime Siege is a vibrant tower defense with rogue-lite elements. Level up, find perfect item combinations, mow down hordes of slimes or fail trying! Strategize and create unique item builds for every map to endure the onslaught. How long can you survive?

name: Slicing Slicing
summary: "Slicing Slicing" is a casual game where players can score points by cutting a small ball that appears on the screen in half.

name: Slendrina: The Cellar 2
summary:
Try to find 8 old books located in different places in the cellar.

There are also keys that you need to find for those locked doors.

name: Slender: The Arrival
summary: Slender Man returns more terrifying than ever. You're on your own. No one to help you. No one to hear you scream. Relive the horror all over again with cutting edge visuals for the 10th Anniversary Update and experience survival horror at its finest.

name: Slotpark
summary: Come on in! Enjoy the ultimate Vegas style casino experience in this unique amusement park with big jackpots, 888 slots and endless fun! Premium-quality graphics and excellent sound effects ensure a unique fairground experience.

name: Slug's Sister Defense
summary: A spin-off from the asymmetric party action game "Goonya Monster," with character designs by Terada Tera! Experience exhilarating roguelike tower-defense action! Defend the captive Snail from enemies approaching from all directions by acquiring and upgrading a variety of weapons and gear!

name: Slime's Journey
