Tap to aim, release to shoot and slingshot your hero to beat your rivals in this dungeon escape race game.
Escape from the lava, outdistance your rivals and climb the leaderboard! Play with your friends or find your equivalents online and unlock new game modes, characters, balls, trails and much more for endless golf race!

name: Sleepwalking Forest
summary: Sleepwalking Forest is an old-fashioned Asian horror sound novel.

name: Slice It All!
summary:
Tap to flip the knife and slice amazing obstacles in juiciest way!
Cut or slice everything and become slice master!

name: Slime Pizza
summary: Slime Pizza is a platform game developed by Neutronized and published by Nitrome. It centres around a slime delivery boy who traverses a laboratory after crash landing on a planet.

name: Sloper
summary: Run faster on the slopes! Take boosts and rings! Fly as much as you can! But don't fall..

name: Slugger 2
summary: The sequel to Chris Hansen's first Slugger map

name: Slay the Dragon
summary: Slay the dragon is a turn based roguelike RPG game, where you must kill the dragon.

name: Slizer Battle Management System
summary: Slizer Battle Management System

name: Slayers
summary:
Slayers is a role-playing video game adaptation of the Slayers light novel series developed by BEC and published by Banpresto for the Super Famicom (SNES) exclusively in Japan in 1994.

Powerful, avaricious sorceress Lina Inverse travels around the world, stealing treasures from bandits who cross her path. Her latest victims, a band of thieves, wait in ambush in a forest, thirsting for revenge. When Lina is about to effortlessly pummel her would-be attackers, the swordsman Gourry Gabriev suddenly announces his presence. Assuming Lina to be a damsel in distress, the foolish yet magnanimous man confronts the brigands in order to rescue her. After defeating them posthaste, the oblivious cavalier decides to escort Lina to Atlas City. Though not very keen on this idea, she ends up accepting his offer.

However, without realizing it, Lina has chanced upon a mighty magical item among her most recent spoils. Now two mysterious men are hunting the young magician and her self-proclaimed guardian to obtain this powerful object for apparently nefarious purposes. This way they begin their adventure, one where the fate of the world itself may be at stake.

name: Sluggish Morss
summary: A philosophical psychedelic think-piece.

name: Slope
summary:
Ski or Snowboard and carve your way down the beautiful snow capped slopes of Mount Gregor.
Tap to navigate, and zig zag your way through the trees and mountains.

name: Slap Shot
summary: A hockey game that plays similar to the air hockey tables found in arcades.

name: Sleeping Dogs: Zodiac Tournament
summary:
Join Wei Shen for the fight of his life. Invited to an exclusive tournament on a hidden island, Wei must overcome the best of the best fighters from across Asia and emerge victorious.

Starring Wei Shen, the Zodiac Tournament invites you to become the dragon and unleash your fists of fury! You must utilize all of your best moves as well as some new ones, to defeat the island’s hidden big boss as Wei enters this deadly game of death. New fighting styles, new combatants and new collectibles are also included in this retro gameplay add-on.

name: SlimeCatcher
summary: Immerse yourself in a world of pixel art. Your mission is simple to bring home 50 different types of slimes for dinner. Some slimes will try to kill you while others are hidden throughout the world. A top down RPG, treasure hunt game A keen eye will be useful to those who play this game.

name: Slimey Climbey Chambers
summary:
Help Sobay the Slime get out of this strange tile maze! Use goop to propel yourself to new heights, and gain new forms and abilities by collecting the mega slime essence!

Made for the GMTK 2024 Jam in 96 hours, for the theme "Built to Scale!"

name: Sleep: H Now
summary: A game in which you can learn Linux commands while playing around.

name: Sleep Simulator
summary: Welcome to the world of "Sleep Simulator," where you will immerse yourself in the fascinating and hyper-realistic world of sleep.

name: Slay the Alice
summary: A short visual novel presented with pixel art and cute animations. Chasing after a rabbit, Alice found herself in a land of talking plants. Now, it's time to go on a tiny little adventure.

name: Sled Bandit

name: Slime World
summary: Slime World is a side-scrolling platform game by Epyx and published by Micro World. Captain Todd is on a mission to explore the green and inhospitable underground world of a mysterious Slime Planet and retrieve all the precious Slime Gems hidden in its depths. Our hero has to visit endless caverns and catacombs filled with green and gooey slime. Six stages are available from the start and each one of them is based around upon a particular scheme - from straight arcade action where Todd has to blast as many enemies as possible, to logic action when the player has to use his brain rather than his fire-power. Todd can run, jump, climb walls or use his water-gun to defeat all the various hordes of slimy enemies the game throws at him. More weapons and special items are available, such as bombs, jet pack or shields. When hit, Todd doesn't lose any life but instead turns greener and greener until he dies - unless he can find a water pond and clean himself up.

name: Slice HD
summary:
WARNING: This is an intense, realistic game, and may be too
disturbing for some players.
Slice is a sinister puzzle game for the iPad. The goal of the game is to clear layers of very sharp blades to push the open button. Push all the buttons in order and you win. While trying to open the puzzle you must not touch the sharp edges of the blades or you will get SLICED. When this happens, blood spills from your finger(s) onto the glass and the puzzle will reset. The blades only move in specific patterns that you must intuit by touch. Often you will have to use multiple fingers to hold blades open while you manipulate other blades with other fingers. This game is really about trying to figure out the hidden behaviors of the blades and moving the blades out of the way, carefully.

name: Sleepwalker
summary:
The game centres on a boy called Lee and his faithful dog Ralph. We're introduced to Lee from the dog's perspective after waking up to find his owner sleepwalking through his bedroom window. Ralph leaps after him and the player then takes control of what happens next.
Throughout the game Lee will relentlessly walk in the direction he is facing, the problem is there are objects and pitfalls in his path that can ultimately wake him up or even kill him. The player can monitor Lee's sleep level with a bar at the top of the screen. If the bar reaches zero, Lee wakes up and the player loses a life. If this happens three (or five depending on settings) times the game is lost.
The player controls Ralph the dog in order to manipulate either Lee, or the objects he is likely to walk into, to see him safely to the end of a level. The frequency of these pitfalls increases as each level progresses and, as it does, the player has to spend more time strategically neutralising threats, far in advance of Lee's actual position in the level.
Although it is possible for Lee to die, resulting in a loss of life and restart of the level for the player, Ralph is invincible, surviving otherwise fatal incidents with comedic effect.
If all the levels are successfully completed Lee finally returns to his bed and crawls back in.

name: Sly 2: Band of Thieves
summary:
Sly 2: Band of Thieves is a stealth-action platformer developed by Sucker Punch Productions and released for PlayStation 2 in 2004. Players control Sly Cooper and his gang as they attempt to dismantle the Klaww Gang and recover the scattered parts of Clockwerk. The game expands on its predecessor with open-ended mission structures, multiple playable characters, and improved stealth mechanics.

The story takes place two years after Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus. In the first game, Sly was becoming a professional thief, but in Band of Thieves, he is a professional thief, so he retains all of the moves from the first game. He also earns new moves and gains different items to assist him in his dark craft. Players might start a level as Sly, and then after completing a particular task, players switch to Bentley, and Murray, respectively.

name: Slime Rancher Rainbow Bundle

name: Sling-A-Thing

name: Slender Hentai Edition

name: Slime Experiments

name: Slam Dunk 2: Zenkoku he no Tip Off
Slaugher League

name: SlapBR

name: Slip Stream
summary:
Slipstream is a sprite-based Formula One racing game featuring four different race tracks; Germany, Japan, Australia and the obligatory Monaco.

players can chose to race in any one of eight different F-1 racing cars, with each offering different levels of handling, acceleration, speed and grip. The game also offers three different play modes; Time Trial (raced over a single course), World Championship (raced over all four courses) and Time Trial (also raced over all four courses).

Each car has a basic high and low gear. Also, as the player races the course, a 'Turbo' meter builds up. The Turbo will occasionally kick in and give the player's car a temporary speed boost. Rival cars are also able to turbo-boost.

name: Slap-It Together!

name: Slippery Delivery

name: Slime with a Sword

name: Slide Puzzle

name: Slowly

name: Slash Quest!

But worry not! Just like Shep and Swordie’s friendship, before you know it everything will feel right and everyone will be counting on you to save the Queendom.

A free expansion to the game Slime-san that is also available as a standalone game. 
 
Sheeple's finally lost it! He is convinced that everything's just part of a giant videogame and that he was coded to simply be a side-character. Which is why he decided to recode himself to become the villain instead... Can you defeat his nefarious levels and come out of it unscathed?

name: Slime Climb

name: Slash Mr. M

name: Slingstar

This game has some dialogue and light puzzle elements. There are 4 full worlds to explore, several unique npcs, 6 effects, and 3 puzzles.

name: Slot Gallina 2
summary:
The first time you connect you will receive 5000 GG Coins.
Choose your bet from 1 to 15 Paylines and GG Coins and spin the reels.
When the 3 or more Bonus symbols appear you will access the Bonus games.

name: SlingSkull Zombies 2
summary: SlingSkull Zombies 2 is an action cartoonish game where your goal is to hit and destroy every zombie in every level by hitting them with a skull projectile.

name: Slaughterhouse Escape
summary: A fun action physics game with a deadly twist, help the animals escape, collect the keys to free your friends and move through the challenging levels, but remember to always stay away from the slaughter room.

name: Slumlord Simulator
summary:
Slumlord Simulator is a turn-based strategy game with a twist of dark humor where your choices matter. In Slumlord Simulator 
you play the bad guy, the slumlord who builds his fortune on the backs of his tenants with the ultimate goal of escaping to Bermuda with his fortune.

name: Slime
summary: Slime Game is a platforming game.

name: Sloth Quest
summary: Control the true king of the jungle as you navigate treacherous vines, battle predators, scale trees and travel to the great beyond. Can you master the precise timing honed by all sloths in the jungle?

name: Slam Jump
summary:
In late 2017, Jagger, a wealthy Russian Media Mogul, introduced the Slam Jump Tournament to the entire world. Warriors from all around the world applied to participate, but only the BEST qualified.
Slam Jump is a two button arcade fighting game drilled to very basic combat actions: Jumping and Kicking. No more having the screen filled with many buttons for different actions. Jumping and Kicking is all that matters and it gives rise to very intense strategic fights.

name: Slay the Beat
summary:
Do you have what it takes to defend our Neon-Cyber Earth from an Alien bots' invasion?
Challenge yourself in this super innovative musical roguelike game!
Clear the Earth from Alien cyborgs with the flow of the rhythm. Bring your clones to the battle, attack and defend with the beats and feel the music to succeed. Use rhythmic patterns to prioritize your targets and try to stun your enemies for extra damage. Unleash all your power with a special attack that will crush your opponents!
Choose the right path on our procedurally generated maps and select the correct items' sets that will lead you to Victory!

name: Slayer of Sin
summary: Slayer Of Sin is a 2D action platformer with simple hack-and-slash mechanics, incorporating arcade-like combat and art. Slayer Of Sin follows an unnamed hero's quest to save the human realm from the seven distinct demons, The Seven Deadly Sins.

name: SlenderMan's Forest
summary: Collect all the pages to escape from the Slender Man! Can you do it before the Slender Man gets you?

name: Slash Them All
summary:
Decapitate zombies and play basketball with their heads to score as many points as possible!
More than twenty characters are to unlock!
Grab your sword and go!

name: Slime Time TD

name: Slayaway Camp: Supernatural Forces Killer Pack
summary: Slayaway Camp's first official Premium Killer pack, each with their own special effects, kill animation, and psychotic tendencies.

name: Slikoban
summary: Slikoban is Sokoban game. Move the cubes to their correct locations and solve the levels.

name: Slam City with Scottie Pippen
summary: Scottie Pippen is here in person to school you in this sports FMV game. Played in first-person mode, you'll go one-on-one in this single-player basketball game as you work the court to earn Respect points for defensive moves such as steals and blocks, then drive the lane and toss up your shots.

name: Sleengster
summary: The villagers are being under attack by the terrible Tikkirama organization. They are in search for the legendary Great Portal Gems. Our hero, Sleengster, must find all the gems in every part of the Village before the bad guys do.

name: Slybots: Frantic Zone
summary:
Following a “Fatal Exception Error”, four little all-purpose robots have been considered faulty and have been marked as out-of-order. They get crazy and start fighting for their survival.

Take their control in the frantic zone and leverage 4 unique stealth mechanics to catch your sly foes off-guard. Don’t be afraid to use dirty tricks to win amazing 3-minute matches across different game modes, proving that you don’t belong to the e-waste dump.

Slybots: Frantic Zone is a local multiplayer dual-stick shooter: all players are looking at the same screen, but there are things that only one of them knows... Master the art of camouflage and enjoy the adrenaline rush of the most frantic zone you’ve ever seen.

name: Slender: Last Sleep
summary:
Slender a terrible walker on the monster called stick insects (Slender Man), who kidnaps people around the world!

He is tall and very thin, always wears a black suit with white shirt and tie. His arms were bent at any point, have no joints and can be extended. He has no face. Slenderman is waiting for you!

name: Slice Back
summary: Alien sushi? Yeah, there's live out there... and it's yummy! Follow a girl and her talking hamster in this hilarious side-scroller action game. Enjoy aerial combat, feed off aliens to get new powers, and eventually (spoiler alert) save the Earth. Grab your soy sauce and get ready for a taste of Slice Back!

name: Slime Volley
summary: Step into the bouncy and exciting arcade game of Slime Volley! This isn't your typical volleyball game – it's an arcade sensation that takes the classic sport and gives it a bouncy, slimy twist. Prepare for a thrilling multiplayer showdown as you leap onto the court for some fast-paced action.

name: Slime Dice
summary: Slime Dice is a Turn-Based Party RPG where you settle battles by playing Yatzi. Create all your own characters, both visually and stat wise, and set out to destroy the beasts of Spegroon!

name: Sludge Factory

name: Slaughter Bots
summary: In 2057 entertainment is not experienced but lived as injected nanobots react to your VR contact lens HUD to give pain and pleasure and where AI can self learn and mutate to eliminate crime and terror.

summary: A "Match-3" puzzle game for the iPhone.

summary: In a world which is invaded and controlled by Jokers, the story begins with a 'maniac' girl called Doris who fight alone with Jokers.

name: Slide 2 Solve Puzzle
summary: Sharpen your memory power by playing Slide 2 Solve Puzzle Game.With a minimalist design solve the shuffled puzzle pics by sliding, swiping, matching with the respective puzzle pieces and combine to form a bigger picture.

name: Slinky
summary: Q-Bert clone

name: Slot Revolution
summary: Travel to a world of fantasy filled with powerful creatures and ageless magic in this addicting slot machine-based, role-playing experience! Do you have what it takes to turn back the tide of blood that threatens your once peaceful world? Become a Warrior, Ranger, or Wizard, each with different skills and abilities! Join forces with friends and allies to take advantage of strength in numbers and leap into action to defeat enemies, earn gold, and find new gear and equipment.

name: Slime Sprint
summary: Sprint through lava ridden dungeons and attempt to achieve the best time possible in this arcade style 2D platformer. With 30 levels to play and many slimes to unlock, can you achieve the medals needed to become the slime sprint king?

name: Slendy!
summary: It has come to this: Internet horror icon Slender Man has been reduced to a virtual pet.

name: Slamoids!
summary: Slamoids! is an intense, re-playable, single player arcade score-chaser. Dodge and shoot slamoids as they hurtle across the screen, while also avoiding the ever growing and shrinking red ring that surrounds you. Slamoids! is a perfect coffee break game for when you only have a few minutes to spare.

name: Slam Dunk: Dream Team - Shueisha Limited
Slither.io
summary: slither.io, a top-10 app on the App Store and the Google Play store, is finally coming to the arcade! The hit game is now available as a multiplayer arcade game with a giant 55″ display and 3 player positions in a compact cabinet to maximize operator revenue and location appeal. As one of the most popular games currently and building on the massively successful base, the arcade version features exclusive game play features that keep players engaged and entertained.

name: Slydris 2
summary:
Sliding and dropping blocks into complete rows has never felt as satisfying or looked as good on a mobile device!

Slydris 2 takes the basic gameplay concept of Slydris--sliding blocks left and right and letting them drop into place to create full rows--and refines it into the ultimate line-clearing endless puzzle game designed specifically for a touch screen. Slydris 2's design brings more strategy and variety, and better balance to the Slydris formula.
The relentlessly addictive gameplay is enhanced further with fantastic visual effects and earth-shaking sounds. Slydris 2 also features 5 beautiful color schemes to unlock, and 5 mesmerizing music tracks that synchronize with the play field visuals.

name: Slurpies Free
summary: Snake, slither, SLURRPP! In this free multiplayer arcade game, control luminescent snakes that grow in length and size. Collect as much food as possible and survive each round without colliding with yourself and other players in fast-pacing battles.

name: Sleepwalker's Journey
summary: A puzzle platformer where you must help the sleepwalking Moonboy reach his bed.

name: Slav Junkie Simulator
summary: You live in a small soviet slav eastern european cyberpunk city. You have severe heroin addiction that you need to sustain. Heroin is very expensive and earnings in a rural city are very small, barely enough for survival. Survive one week.

Kano had been always in love with his best friend and senpai, Aki. However, his lack of courage and timidity hinders him to show his true feelings. This one rainy night, he’s given the chance to be alone with Aki. You have in your hands the fate of this young love.

But choose carefully, things can’t always be as you expect. Help Kano through his decisions to get the perfect ending.

Will this sleepover be a memory to regret... or a night to remember?

name: Slider

name: Slave of God
summary: A multicolored, surreal trip through a pulsating nightclub.

name: Slime Slayer

name: Sly Slime

summary: Single player stealth game with a horror background story

name: Sleepless
summary: A 4-minute horror experience.

The first installment of The Legend of Tales.
Sleeping BeautyX(KOR New paid apps) is ranked 3rd in just 7days.
Sleeping BeautyX !!

Venture a huge Maze and Confront against horrid Monsters!

English, Japanese, Korean

iPhone4S or more

name: Slime Story
summary: Immerse yourself in the story and explore large, dangerous and exciting locations of new 3D platformer, filled up with many interesting and unusual mechanics that make this game unique. Go through the levels and try to beat the developer's best score!

summary: Blast 'n bop your friends in this Local Multiplayer Arcade game! (2-4 players)

name: Slime: Desulted
summary: A small platformer-like game about Slimes that stick to walls.

name: Slimoid
summary: Help the Slimoid to find his brothers or Mom will absorb him !

name: Slice Zombies for Kinect
summary: Slice zombies using the Xbox One Kinect!

name: Slimed
summary: Slimed is an action-platformer where you play as an extraterrestrial slime captured by military agents testing your capabilities. Show them just how weak their Earth weapons are!

name: Slaughter 2: Prison Assault
summary:
We recieved a disturbing message: a riot took place in Burdeck Prison. The whole personel is dead, city surroundings are captured. Mysterious and mad man called Tsantsa is behind all these events.
Special Ops were sent immediately into the city, their task is to clear the city itself and prison blocks from crazy inmates.

City streets are full of lunatics and thugs, what means that you should grab guns and start to fight!
You can break through the enemies, destroying everything that moves, like a true soldier. But you can also search for secret intel and records, to put together pieces of a gruesome story that took place in Burdeck's Prison."

In game you have a wast variety of weapons, enemies and intense bossfights!
Due to excellent shooting system you can feel power of each and every gun from which you will fire, and deeply elaborated damage system make every kill unique and exciting. Make ambushes and put traps for the enemy, prowl behind them or be a trigger-happy guy, who will annihilate anyone who opposes him!
If you want to play an excellent shooter with morbid humor - this game is truely for you!

name: SLG Remix

SLG Remix is an alternate kinetic version of the brand new 16-bit horror visual novel/adventure Mega Drive game Sacred Line Genesis.
A surreal, twisted kinetic novel tribute to obscure visual novel / adventure games of 90s.

name: Sliptime Sleuth

name: Slay Bells
summary: Slay Bells is a Christmas-themed survival horror game inspired by 80's slasher movies and PS1 horror games.

name: Slimes RPG
summary: "Slimes RPG" is a perfect game for fans of rpg games, with all the elements characteristic of these games. A great adventure awaits you in this game with ambience and spatial plot.

name: Slitterhead: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Includes:
1. Xbox game: "Slitterhead"
2. Bonus app "Slitterhead Digital Soundtrack & Artbook":
- Artbook with commentary by Keiichiro Toyama: "The Art of Slitterhead"
- Soundtrack composed and written by Akira Yamaoka (10 tracks)
*Image and sound data cannot be exported to a USB memory device or similar devices. Content can only be accessed within the app.

name: Slam Dragon
summary: Wage a fierce battle in fighting action with CD rendered music and realistic characters. 8 fighters have taken to the fight and seek to confront X.

name: Slingo Supreme

name: Slope

This game might look simple but playing this will give you extreme adrenaline rush. Just remember to avoid obstacles and those red blocks.

name: Slot
summary: Slot machine doujin game developed by Shingo.

name: Slo's Home

name: Slash/Jump

name: Sleeping Beauty

name: Slasher
summary: Welcome to an epic adventure like no other. Slasher - a game that promises non-stop action, adventure and excitement! In this game, you play as a fierce and powerful female character, ready to take on the world and all its challenges.

name: Slidey Feet
summary:
The objective is to step on each icy block in the level, cracking it underneath you.
Once all the blocks are cracked, this will break away the small cluster of rocks blocking your exit.
But, if you step back on a cracked block, you will fall off and will have to start again... From the start! So pay close attention to where you step!

name: Sleepy Squares
summary:
The goal is to help the Sleepy Squares get to sleep by placing them next to their fellow squares. The catch is they only close 1 eye for every square adjacent to them and they all have a different number of eyes.
That’s right, it has infinite potential if you are up for the challenge. Show off to your friends in our global sleepy leaderboards and see where your sleep IQ stacks up. Unlock multiple game modes and play them simultaneously with all your game data kept intact.

name: Slendr
summary: Slightly different take on the "collect objects while evading Slender Man" concept, with player physical movement controlling the character.

name: Slime Knight
summary: Use an extendable slime arm to “dissolve”, punch, grab, and throw enemies in order to save your slime brethren and navigate through the decrepit insides of an ancient Worm in this top-down hoard battler.

name: Slimesphere
summary: Slimesphere is an isometric turn-based tactics game, where the goal is to kill the enemy slimes within 3 rounds. Its deterministic mechanics make the levels feel like puzzles, and you have to figure out the best strategy to win!

name: Slay the Zone
summary: Face hundreds of monsters, upgrade your equipment and try to survive as long as you can. In this Action Roguelite choose from a variety of upgrades, unlock unique characters and create the best build to slaughter everyone in your path!

name: Sliding Swords
summary: A roguelite, dungeon crawler, where you move all objects at the same time, and the same types that touch - merge into one! Defeat enemies, level up, solve quests, unlock new things, upgrade your character, and cast powerful spells! This game is a part of the TAnima Universe.

name: Slurkum
summary: The multiplayer survival fantasy you've been looking for! Set in a timeless era, Play how you want to build a character with unique stats, skills, karma, and reputation as you slay monsters, war factions, loot graves, cast spells, hunt down PK or be one yourself!

name: Sleeping Dogs: Monkey King Pack
summary: With the power of the immortals great strength is bestowed upon you! The Monkey King outfit includes its own buff, signature weapon, and vehicle. While wearing this full-body outfit you are automatically granted a double-handed staff during melee and can travel across Hong Kong on the unique Cloud Motorcycle.

name: SlideNSlip
summary: SlideNSlip is a cute, casual, and challenging top-down puzzle game, in which the goal is to maneuver Mac and his penguin friends around so that Mac can get to his jet ski and escape the icy island he's stuck on.

name: Slouching Towards Bedlam
summary: Enter a steampunk adventure set in a London that might have been. The year is 1885. Bedlam Hospital still stands in Moorsfield, a decaying shell used to house the poor and the hopeless. Steam-driven mechanical wonders roam the streets. Gear-wheeled analytical engines spin out reams of thought onto punched paper tapes. And in the darkness – in the alleys and the side shops – hide secrets. A piece of interactive fiction written by Star Foster and Daniel Ravipinto.

name: Slay To The End
summary: "Slay To The End" is an intense and thrilling survival roguelite game that plunges you into the edge of the apocalypse. Faced with hordes of terrifying creatures, your only option is to wield your weapon and embark on a brutal journey of slaughter, battling until the very last moment.

name: SlimeJumper: Ultimate Jump
summary: SlimeJumper: Ultimate Jump is a 2D platform. Prove yourself.

name: Slime Quest
summary:
The MMORPG "players" have been hunting us and turning us into EXP and alchemy materials.
You're a surviving slime, the only hero who can save their kind!

name: Slither
summary: Slither is similar in nature to the hit arcade game Centipede by Atari. You control your snake as it slither's around the screen. Where this game differs greatly from Centipede is that you can shoot in 4 different directions at the same time to take out the baddies trying to hunt you down. The bad snakes hunting you down will appear from various angles on the screen, often several at a time. The game was bundled with Coleco's Roller Controller and can't be played without it.

name: Slav Tiles

name: Slime Scramble

name: Slimes and Beyond Xbox Bundle
summary: Slimes and Beyond Xbox Bundle version game bundle.

name: Slippery Heights

How to Write “Argentina” in KANJI?
Learn Country Names in KANJI with a Fun Puzzle Game!

Hello Comrades ! You think you got what it takes to be tru slav?
Then we have game for you ! Prove to all your gopnik friends
that you are the superior alpha slav your babushka always wanted you to be.

name: Slot Car VR
summary:
Slot Car VR is a sandbox building and racing game, that allows you to transform your home into the ultimate racing track for you and others to enjoy.
Bringing back the nostalgia and joy of slot car racing in your home, but this time it's even better!
With limitless track and the ability to save, upload and race tracks with the community, your imagination is your only limitation!

Just as you would in real life, use your hands to grab and move objects around the virtual world as you help guide the ball to the basket. Move blocks and panels to create a path for the ball to follow.

summary: Slime Jumper Adventure is a 2D platformer game where you are tasked with guiding the main character through multiple different levels of creative obstacles that increase in difficulty the further you get.

name: Slide Puzzle World History
summary:
For Current Students and Those Relearning!
Fun World History Puzzle Game

Slimey, Jump! Is a tiny one-button platformer game with 28 levels and 4 bosses.
It's meant to be a simple but challenging game that everyone can enjoy, regardless of their skill level!

name: Slotter Up Core 8

name: Slide Puzzle: Cute Moe Girls
summary: Cute girl slide puzzle

name: Sleeping Dogs: Ghost Pig
summary: Become the elusive movie star with the Ghost Pig mask. Dogeyes’ black fedora hat, an assassin’s straw hat, and a lone sheriff’s hat are also included in this free pack.

name: Slaughterfest 2011
summary: A compilation of 32 slaughter maps, each designed to be played from a pistol start.

name: Slash & Roll
summary: Join an online RPG multiplayer game and roll dice to face off against other guilds! Play with friends online in epic co-op battles. Fight in multiplayer PvP team battles against other guilds to dominate the ranking! It’s just the beginning of what Slash & Roll, one of the most interesting online multiplayer games with friends, has to offer!

name: Slam
summary: Control gravity and negotiate your way through a series of increasingly difficult puzzles!

name: SleepWalk
summary: Sleepwalk is an indie survival horror game, the story begins with the player waking up in an unknown and dark place, trying to escape and discover hidden secrets with no memory of their arrival.

name: Sluggish Morss: Pattern Circus
summary: A claymation 2d adventure game set in a dark and cryptic future. Another Time Expression, a temporal interference phenomenon, has been predicted leaving those that govern anxious. You will discover its effects on the lives of eight playable characters; a hunter, a dreamer, an artist, a child; a racer, a fighter, a scientist and a detective. Explore an intricate, tactile world full of feverish, intertwining stories told with humour, irreverence and melancholy.

name: Slasho
summary: Dive into Slasho, a mouse-driven bullet hell roguelike where your precision guides a samurai's blade. Cut through hordes, unlock skills, and face unique enemies in this action-packed quest for supremacy. Are you ready to defy death and embrace the samurai's path?

name: Slaughterfest
summary: A very hard map filled with all sorts of monsters. Slaughterfest takes place in a seaside town and you start with no weapons.

name: Slice
summary: Slice your way through the worlds of mind trials.

name: Slendytubbies 2D
summary: Slendytubbies 2D is a two-dimensional pixelated remake of the Slendytubbies series.

name: Slay the Spire II
summary: The iconic roguelike deckbuilder returns. Craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, and discover relics of immense power in Slay the Spire 2!

name: Slash Abyss
summary: Slash fate, Break free! 'Slash Abyss' is a light roguelike RPG. You play as a powerful but amnesiac character. Join your 'deceased' comrades, equip yourself with diverse items, and unravel the story's secrets, all with the goal of achieving 'resurrection'."

name: Slitherin'
summary: Snake game but with classes and chaos!

name: Slayers Online
summary: Slayers Online (abbreviated SO) is a 2D MMORPG indie game. Entirely in French and free, it is available for Windows and Linux platforms. The scenario takes place in a medieval-fantasy world. You can complete quests, craft items, fight bosses and play against other players in multiple game modes. You can also make your own skins and join guilds to play with your friends.

name: Slay All Goblins
summary: Casual hack and slash with bits of visual novel elements! Free to play 2D hack and slash game, with pixel art and animations. This is a mobile to PC port, with high res images & XBOX controller support (recommended).

name: Slit Your Wrists!
summary: Short controversial flash game from early days of newgrounds.

name: Slaughterfest 2012
summary: Another compilation of slaughter maps, 35 to be precise. Designed to be played from pistol start.

name: Sleeping Dawn VR
summary: Sleeping Dawn VR is a survival horror cooperative game up to 4 players in virtual reality. Join into this confusing procedural maze with your friends, cooperate with them, make quick choices while facing your deepest fear in first person. Get lost... has never been so real.

name: Slingo Supreme HD
summary:
Slingo is the addictive and fun combination of SLOTS and BINGO!
With Slingo Supreme, we really wanted to pull out all the stops and make the ultimate Slingo game that would be a flagship product for all the Slingo fans. Slingo Supreme is the game that we've always wanted to play on our iPads, it is the most polished, full-featured Slingo game ever.
The heart of this fun new Slingo game is the innovative Supreme mode.
In Supreme, as you play, you will unlock powerups. These powerups will then let you build your own custom Slingo game! Unlock more powerups, and build even more types of Slingo games. Each combination makes a totally new play experience. And get this, with 12 types of powerups, you can combine them each in different ways to create over 16,000 ways to play!!! Can you create your own favorite game to give you that top score?
But we just didn't stop there. We've always heard from fans about features they wanted. And in Slingo Supreme, we are delivering them.
Hate the Devil? Is this game, instead of just taking half your points, you now finally get to beat him at his own game. Slingo Supreme contains the New Devil Mini Games that let you get back at the devil.
Bummed out when you don't get a match? Now you can enable Reel Nudge which will give you another chance to make a match by knocking the reels when no match exists. Nothing like banging the machine to demand a match!
Want a new challenge every day? Now, the game will create a custom challenge for you each day. And check this out, it does it dynamically so you will never run out of daily challenges.

name: Slingshot Puzzle
summary: This game is a kind of golf and billiards fusion, just cooler.

name: Sloanysoft C64 SEUCK Games
summary: These games were made in the 80s on a Commodore 64, using Palace Software's Shoot'Em Up Construction Kit. Sloany made these back when he was about 11 or 12. The tapes were found some years later & preserved for posterity as TAP files.

name: Sloany vs. Reggie
summary: Take the role of Sloany or his mate Reggie as they plod through a load of bad guys that loosely resemble whatever he was into at the time – ninjas, batman, arcade machines, Subbuteo players, Pac-Man etc.

name: SleepWalker
summary: A classic of Spanish developer Exelweiss.

name: Slaughterfest 3
summary: A long awaited third entry in the series, this is another compilation of 35 slaughter maps designed to be played from pistol start

name: Sleep In Office
summary:
What's wrong with sleeping on the job?
Napping at work is now a game!
Sleep In Office is a game about full-on sleeping on the job.
If you do this at your real job you'll get fired, but in the game sleep as much as you can until you get caught by the boss!

name: SlovSurvival
summary: A Zombie Round Survival Game set in a Biomechanical Fantasy Abandoned Island.

name: Slaves
summary: A man who dies in an accident gets reincarnated into a parallel world to fight evil!

name: Sled Storm
summary:
Sled Storm is a series of snowmobile racing video games published and developed by Electronic Arts and released in North America on July 31, 1999 and in Europe on August 11, 1999. It gained critical acclaim due to its original concept of being one of the first snowmobile racing titles. The series currently consists of two games, both of which are named simply Sled Storm. 
 
The game features snowmobiles (referred to as sleds), stunts and fourteen snow-covered courses consisting of slippery slopes, inclement weather and treacherous cliffs. Six racers were selectable from the outset and two more were unlockable, each of which had different snowmobile handling attributes.

name: Slasher Lock
summary: Try to escape from a murderer in a top down survival horror game

name: Slappy Paddles
summary:
Test your reflexes in this single player reimaging of the classic arcade tennis game.
Battle your way through 5 different levels, each offering a unique style and set of obstacles to overcome.
Between bouncing off pinball paddles, doging 8-bit style space ships, or navigating the paths of a mini-golf course, you won't be able to let your guard down for a second.

name: Slink & Snatch: Tales of Thievery
summary: Unleash your inner thief in this VR stealth collectathon. As Slink, sneak, grapple and glide to explore every nook and cranny of a mysterious town in search of an arcane secret - and other people’s treasure, of course. All with the help from Snatch, your demon-grappling-gauntlet.

name: Sloth Story
summary: Tale of a sloth woken up rudely by an earthquake

name: Slow and Steady
summary: Slow and Steady is a game where you make the slowest tortoise ever reach the finish line.

name: Slug Blast
summary: Slug Blast is an explosive action-packed top-down shooter about an astronauts, who crashed on alien slug infested planet.

name: Slash or Die
summary:
In this game you will face violence and extraordinary complexity. 
You will have to become one of three heroes to slash enemies or to die from their hands. 
What will your hero do? It depends only on your skills…

name: SlimeSlider
summary: SlimeSlider is a puzzle game about navigating levels by pushing boxes. In each level, you must push boxes in order to overcome (or take advantage of) your tendency to slide in order to direct the blob to the exit portal.

name: Sleepi Boi Can't Sleep
summary: Help Sleepi Boi find a way to sleep well. It's a rainy night while you explore his house along the way.

name: Slave Princess Finne: Why Did She Sell Out Her Own Kingdom?
summary: This is a war waged between the "princesses" representing the whole race to bet on world hegemony. Once upon a time, it was the human princess who won the battle. From then on, the elves were reduced to "slaves". A thousand years later. The war of the princesses begins again.

name: Slask's Adventure
summary: A 152-star kaizo romhack of Super Mario 64 with an easier version available. This was developed by two Chinese modders,Slask and Liuzijun.

name: Slotter Up Core 5
summary: Slotter Up Core 5: Lupin Daisuki! Shuyaku wa Zenigata is a pachinko simulation based on the Lupin manga.

name: Slot Machine
summary: Slot Machine is a Casino-game from 1979 for the Atari 2600.

name: Sly 2: Band of Thieves
summary: Sly 2: Band of Thieves is an updated version of the 2004 original, featuring high-definition graphics, improved performance, and integrated trophy support. Released as part of the Sly Cooper Collection on the PlayStation 3, it retains the core gameplay while modernising the visual presentation for contemporary standards.

name: Slashers
summary: A game featured in Action 52. They are everywhere. Mean guys with nails that are nine inch knives and they like to slash everything that comes into there path. Don't get in their way or you're the next victim.

name: Slamdunk VR
summary:
-This is a VR game that really brings you the shooting experience.
-We’ve got a powerful physical system that allows everyone to shoot like a NBA star!
-There is an online ranking board as well. Come on! Show your excellent shooting techniques and your best score to the world!

name: Slime Adventure 2
summary: This time, Slime goes in search of treasure. Go through many obstacles, destroy monsters, pick up a good moment to jump, jump over spikes, divide, make your way through the water, jump off the walls, look for keys to go further and find the treasure.

name: Sled Builders
summary: Physics-based sled-building game where only your imagination is the limit. Wishlist now!

name: Sleep Walk
summary: This sleepy little penguin surely wouldn't like to be woken, given the bizarre and scary challenges he faces in order to get back home to bed. Can you help?!

name: Slenderman Must Die: Survivors
summary: Slenderman Must Die: Survivors is a survival shooter game that allows you to switch between third-person and first-person camera views. Choose from five different characters and confront waves of weird creatures coming at you from all directions.

name: Sleep Terror
summary: The game "Sleep Terror" is a horror adventure game that tells the story of a teenager waking up at night in his own dream. Travel to different places in your head to get out of the nightmare

name: Slippery Sammy
summary: Slippery Sammy is an arcade game where you help Sammy to walk as further as possible in a snowy afternoon, trying not to slip so much on the freezing sidewalk.

name: Sloppy Eater: Meal Deal Edition
summary:
A new and improved version of the classic sloppy eater game!
Get to the end of the supermarket without running out of blood!
This game was originally developed for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam.

name: Slashing Samurai
summary: 2D roguelike pixel art survival game.

name: Sleeping Dogs: Tactical Soldier Pack
summary: Command authority as you dominate the streets with the Tactical Soldier Pack. The Assault Rifle from ‘The Funeral’ and ‘Civil Discord’ missions with its under-barrel grenade launcher will be readily available at each of your apartments. Always accessible, grab it whenever you feel the need to unleash a display of force.

name: Sleeping Dogs: Drunken Fist Pack
summary: With the Drunken Fist outfit Wei unleashes this exclusive fighting style. While in combat, filling the face meter will enable you to drink from your flask and perform special moves and unique counters. Sway like a drunkard, hit like a mule.

name: Sleeping Dogs: Wheels of Fury
summary: The Wheels of Fury Pack gives you full control of the ultimate prototype supercar to tear up Hong Kong - the DZS-90. Uncover the story of Dr. Tang’s secret prototype across 5 all-new missions - each time adding incredible upgrades to the vehicle. The DZS-90 in its final form includes twin, concealed roof-mounted machine guns, 4-wheel steering, an electronic magnetic pulse, boosted speed and armor, and new styling options to show it off.

name: Slender Multiplayer
summary:
You and up to seven others enter the Slenderman forest.
As a survivor, you must collect all 8 pages to escape and free your curse.
As Slenderman, you must eliminate all survivors.
Play Singleplayer or Multiplayer with 8 player lobbies!
You have the option to play vs a CPU Slenderman or vs another player.

name: Slime Puzzle Story
summary: "Slime Puzzle Story" is a puzzle game in which you roll a slime. Move various items in addition to the slime to advance the story of humorous adventures in a mysterious village!

name: Slice the Ice
summary: Just SLICE THE ICE in this adorable physics-heavy puzzle adventure.

name: Sludge & Sorcery
summary: A Gameboy Game for GBJam8

name: Slime Hero
summary: Slime Hero is a slime collecting and fighting game, you need to collect and select the best slime team to pass all the stage, after that you can go to challenge the boss, try to dodge all the attack and kick away all the enemy.

name: Slimesventure: Your Destination
summary: Slimesventure is a strategy building game where you have to play against the time. Integrate yourself into a new life, take revenge on your enemies and get back what has been stolen from you. The value that was stolen from you is immense and would have changed your whole life, if you had known about

name: Slice It!
summary: Brain-tickling geometric puzzles are the name of the game with Slice It! Use the stylus to draw straight lines through a shape to make smaller identical shapes within a limited number of tries. Easy to learn but hard to master, become one with your stylus to cut those extra tricky shapes down to size! Variety is the slice of life with hundreds of different stages to slice through! Special themes, music and other unlockables keep you coming back for more. Japanese styled theme will be available as an original bonus for the Nintendo 3DS version! Developed by Arc System Works and COM2US.

name: S Lanes
summary:
S Lanes is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are constantly moving between the four lanes on the left side of the screen. Your goal is to shoot enemies that are coming from the right to keep them from reaching the lanes. Hold a button to shoot and to move forward towards the enemies. Collect the coins that enemies drop after you destroy them to score points.

The game is over when any enemy reaches any of the lanes.

name: Slender Man: Chapter 2 - Survive
summary: Slender Man is back in this all new sequel to the indie mobile hit game Slender Man - Chapter 1: Alone. Can you stand the suspense as Slender Man stalks you through 3 all new terrifying, 3D levels? He got some new surprises in store that are sure to make you scream. Beware, this is not an easy game.

name: Slender Man: Chapter 1 - Alone
summary:
Slenderman! was a brand new 3D survival horror game based upon the Slender Man (slenderman) legend. See how long you can survive before Slender Man gets you, with only your wits to help you!

This game was for IOS and Android before it was deleted from the App Store and Play Store, and the developer of this game was Digital Code Works.

name: Slender Man: Chapter 3 - Dreams
summary: The next chapter in the indie horror simulator smash hit series. This is a sequel to Slender Man - Chapter 1: Alone and Slender Man - Chapter 2: Survive.

name: Slender Rising
summary:
Slender Rising is a 2012 horror and indie mobile game by Michael Hegemann. It is based on the creepypasta called Slender Man, a tall, faceless man who hunts people down and inspired by the PC game Slender: The Eight Pages.

The first-person game tasks players with collecting notes across various maps whilst trying to avoid the Slender Man.

name: Slender Rising 2
summary: Slender Rising 2 is the sequel to its predecessor Slender Rising but features a weapon and additional locations.

name: Slide: Platformer
summary: Slide: Platformer is a hardcore game with an unorthodox control scheme. It will make you think. It might make you cry. It will test your platforming skills to the limit!

name: Sleepless Night 2: Ladies' Night(mare)
summary: The sequel of the to the original game 'Sleepless Night', Sleepless Night 2: Ladies' Night(mare) is a horror/psycho sound novel.

name: Slow Damage
summary:
Slow Damage takes place at some point during the 21st century in the fictional ward of Shinkomi, which is located in Tokyo, Japan and was previously a part of the Tokyo Bay City No. 13 subregion. The country is in the midst of a recession and, in an attempt to resolve these economic troubles, the government repurposed this area as a large-scale casino resort due to its historic prosperity. This ward is governed by the corrupt Takasato Group whose only interest is their own financial gain.

The story follows Towa, a resident of Shinkoumi who lives his life in a carefree and apathetic manner, showing no concern for his future. The only thing that captures his interest is painting—more specifically, painting the innermost desires of other people.

name: Sleep When I'm Dead: Chapter 0
summary: On October 31st, Sophie ascends through the chambers of Regis Academy to find Suzy and give her a treat, fighting hordes of monsters along the way.

name: Sleeping Dogs: Police Protection Pack
summary: Catch criminals like a true SWAT with the Police Protection Pack. Unlocks exclusive High Speed police mission, SWAT outfit, SWAT police cruiser car and SWAT assault rifle.

name: Slendytubbies: Worlds
summary: Slendytubbies: Worlds is the sixth and last game of the Slendytubbies series developed by ZeoWorks.

name: Slimelon
summary: Try to defeat the chaos generated by a multitude of slimes, each one cuter (almost) than the other. Discover all the fusions, collect them... And try to be the best (temporary) slime breeder!

name: Slippy the Frog
summary: Much like Slippy himself, this game is jam packed with mini games, cuteness, and gallons of juice.

name: Sleepless Cinderella: Party
summary:
Become the heroine in a modern time fairytale!
Make your dream celebrity fall in love with Voltage’s new dating sim. Enjoy the new and improved user interface and choose your virtual boyfriend from a group of incredibly handsome celebrities!

name: Slayer Knight
summary: You are the Knight called upon to explore the depths of these ravaged Lands. With speed, precision, and the swing of your sword, you can conquer the scourge of the Ancients and become the Slayer Knight.

name: Slot! Pro 2 Advance: Go Go Juggler & New Tairyou
summary: Slot! Pro 2 Advance: Go Go Juggler & New Tairyou is a Miscellaneous game, published by Nippon Telenet, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Sliding Hero
summary: Sliding Hero is a top-down puzzle Metroidvania where you slide in a single direction until hitting an obstacle. Trapped in a sinister 1700s Venetian villa, explore a world inspired by Venice’s carnival that will test your wits to overcome challenges, uncover secrets, and unmask your destiny.

name: Slum Dweller
summary: Slum Dweller is a physics-based fighting game about typical situations that slum dwellers encounters on a daily basis. Try on the role of a slum dweller trying to survive in a harsh criminal environment or a street fighter taking part in underground tournaments.

name: Slime Village VR
summary: Slime Village VR is a 3D sandbox in cute Lowpoly graphics, created especially for virtual reality glasses.

name: Slice of Life
summary: In this casual, first-person slicing sim, you take control of a citizen in a small town who is convinced that everything around them is cake. Use your trusty knife to slash your way through books, trees, dumpsters, and just about everything in town to prove what you know to be true: it's all cake.

name: Slingy Snow
summary:
Welcome to Slingy Snow.
Sling the snowball. Avoid yellow snow. Collect Gems.
Super enjoyable and satisfying holiday game.
I bet you easily beat level 10!

name: Slayin DX
summary: Run through wave after wave of monsters with your weapons, spells or mounts in this endless single screen arcade game.

name: Slaves to Armok: God of Blood
summary: A single-player fantasy RPG. The game can also be described as a Roguelike.

name: Slingshottr
summary: A co-op physics-based space scrap salvaging game! Work with friends to bring in scrap and receive spaceship upgrades.

name: Slashes
summary: Just a casual talk between a girl and a knife.

name: Slave Zero X: Calamity Edition
summary:
Slave Zero X is a stylish 2.5D character action game set in the biopunk world of Slave Zero (1999). Run & Slash your way through a dystopian future in this character action game which will resonate with fans of Devil May Cry, Strider, and Guilty Gear.

Slave Zero X: Calamity Edition includes:

The Standard Edition physical game
All the contents included in the Standard Edition (Guidebook, Control Card, and exclusive skin)
An Exclusive Artbook which also includes a comic (in English)
3 art cards
2 CDs with the Original Sound Tracks of Slave Zero X as well as the original Slave Zero game!
All contents packaged in a collectible tuck-in box

name: Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 5
summary: Slenderman Must Die: Underground Bunker is the fifth episode of the Slenderman Must Die series from Poison Games.

name: Slime Slayer
summary: Slime Slayer is a 3rd person action roguelite focused on the destruction of ALL SLIMES! Craft unique spells and character builds with mechanically and functionally distinct elements and modifier runes to conquer a slime-infested forest.

name: Slash of Sword
summary:
Fight on the arena, earn fame, get famous. Exciting, bloody gladiator fights are waiting for you! Fight fairly 1 on 1 or try to defeat 10 fighters. 
Rest from the battles in the village, upgrade your skills, unlock new weapons and armor.

name: Slingshot Hero VR
summary: This arcade style shooting range will test your accuracy as you race to take down as many targets as possible with nothing but a slingshot and some special ammunition.

name: Slice of Ages
summary: A top down action rpg with rougelike elements. You'll encounter plenty of opposition trying to make your way to the Slice of Ages. Slice your way through hordes of enemies with unique relics in order to stop Dastardly Duck.

name: Slime Survivors
summary: 《Slime Survivors》 is a casual bullet heaven game, where you can indulge in mowing down enemies in the monster-infested ocean, collecting rewards, and upgrading weapons to become a terrifying killing machine in this fantastical realm.

name: Sleuth
summary: As you begin a game of Sleuth a murder has just been committed. Your job is to mingle with the house guests and to search the contents of the house until you feel you have solved the crime. Every game of Sleuth is different so you must fully explore the house each time that you play. As your investigation proceeds the murderer will begin to grow suspicious and will most likely start plotting your demise. If you have not figured out who the murderer is by this point in the game, your chances of survival are slim.

name: SlingSkull Zombies: The Dawn
summary: SlingSkull Zombies: The Dawn is an action cartoonish game where your goal is to hit and destroy every zombie in every level by hitting them with a skull projectile.

name: Slot Gun
summary: Slot Gun is a satisfying deckbuilding slot-machine game where you face off against several opponents to control the board. It is a blend of luck and skill where timing is key and dopamine is everywhere.

name: Slam Dunk: Gakeppuchi no Kesshou League
summary: Slam Dunk: Gakeppuchi no Kesshou League is a Game Boy basketball game based on the anime Slam Dunk.

name: SlipBreak
summary: SlipBreak Version Typhoon is the first iteration of the SB Franchise in Early Access. Featuring two separate levels which showcase gameplay currently in active development; allowing the community to be apart of the process.

name: Slime, Fire and Soul
summary: You enter the DUNGEON and try to get as far as possible.

name: Slime Coming
summary: Slimes have invaded the world! 6 heroes have to save the world and investigate the cause. Slime Coming is a casual game with light rogue-like elements and survivor type. Fully automatic attack, through upgrades, strengthen your hero and defeat slimes and monsters.

name: Slide!
summary: An expanded version of Slide! with additional levels.

name: Slender: The Arrival VR
summary: Slender: The Arrival returns more terrifying than ever, now in VR.

name: Sloppy Forgeries
summary: Sloppy Forgeries is a fast-paced, two-player local multiplayer painting game. Each player is given a mouse, a blank canvas, and a few simple paint tools. Each round, a famous painting from art history is revealed. Players race to copy the painting as quickly and accurately as possible.

name: Slidey
summary:
Anytime, Anywhere, Offline. Exercises your thinking skill.
WELCOME TO SLIDEY! Slidey is a brand new puzzle game that trains your brain!
Now players can choose from 2 Skins: The ClASSIC one and also a new CATS theme!
We give you SLIDEY, the ultimate Puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

name: Slash It 2
summary: Slash It 2 is a 2D colorful arcade game. The goal is to press letters, numbers and type words in the right time and direction.

name: SlingSkull Zombies
summary: SlingSkull Zombies is an action cartoonish game where your goal is to hit and destroy every zombie in every level by hitting them with a skull projectile.

name: Slime Battles
summary: Slime Battles is a fast-paced online multiplayer Platformer Shooter. The emphasis on skillshots and short game times make for a high skill, high action experience on a low time investment. Currently in closed alpha and is available for PC and Mac.

name: Slurpy
summary: You control a strange green blob of a creature with a long trunk sticking out the front, moving it around in a one-screen, non-scrolling, open cave. In every level, your goal is to eat ten floating seeds. Meanwhile, of course, the game does its best to prevent you from doing so, by throwing a multitude of different monsters against you. Fortunately nearly every monster in the game can be eaten as well. If an enemy touches Slurpy, you can kiss one of your precious lives goodbye; but woe to the enemy that strays in front of Slurpy's trunk and is caught by his amazing suction power!

name: Slimefrog
summary: Use your tongue as a grappling hook to navigate up an exotic and unforgiving world, while being verbally abused by a flying snake. Be careful, any fall can send you all the way back down...

name: Slick Slack
summary: A simple puzzle game in which you, as a player, will need to use your brain.

name: Slayin
summary: An action RPG game for Android and iOS devices in which players choose a character from one of three heroes: knight, wizard and knave. After which they fight through continuous waves of monsters and bosses, leveling up and equipping new weapons all along the way. But once you die, you’re gone for good!

name: Slapshot
summary: Slapshot is an online multiplayer game where you and 5 other players play a game of hockey. The game is physics-based, so teamwork and crisp passing are essential to win. Play with your friends or team up with other Slapshot players!

name: Slenderman vs. Freddy the Fazbear
summary: Urban Legends clash! Fight as your favorite Fear Character.

name: Slender: Anxiety
summary:
He will find you sooner or later

Slender: Anxiety is a short experimental horror game created by Hades Productions developed through the Unity3D engine. This game is based off Slender: The Arrival made by Blue Isle Studios and Parsec Productions.

name: Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus
summary:
Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus is a stealth-platformer developed by Sucker Punch Productions and published by Sony Computer Entertainment. Released in 2002 for the PlayStation 2, the game follows Sly Cooper, a skilled raccoon thief, as he and his gang attempt to recover the Thievius Raccoonus, a book containing the secrets of his family's thieving legacy. The gameplay combines stealth, platforming, puzzle-solving, and light combat, and is noted for its cel-shaded visuals and humorous narrative.

This game is divided into five worlds, each themed around a particular part of the world and the villain headquartered there. Most worlds are structured as a central hub with entrances to numerous individual levels. Each of the levels has a primary goals which earns the player a key. You must collect all the keys in the world to fight the world's boss.

Many of the levels have a platformer structure. The objective of these worlds is to reach the location of the key. There are substantial stealth elements here as the player must dodge searchlights and trips lasers which set off alarms and avoid alerting guards. In addition to the main objective, there are clue bottles to find. Finding all the clues in a level allows you to open a safe with a page from the Thievius Raccoonus which grants a new ability of some sort. After getting this, there is also a master thief sprint where the player must get from the start of a level to the exit within a time limit.

name: Sluggish Morss: Ad Infinitum
summary: A continuation of the story and themes from Sluggish Morss (2013) and Sluggish Morss: A Delicate Time in History (2013).

name: Slime Feet
summary: Slime Feet is a linear visual novel, a love story for everyone who has ever had to love through a keyboard. Slime Feet is about the body horror of an inevitable drawn out death, and the lesbian slime feet cybersex that comes with it.

name: Slime Survivor
summary: You crash landed on a strange alien planet; your arm is broken, but your mind awakened. Use telekinesis to make the enemies themselves your weapon in this physics-based game, as they charge you in countless waves.

name: Slime in a Trench Coat: A Cooking Mystery
summary: Slime in a Trench Coat: A Cooking Mystery is a narrative-driven 2D mystery sidescroller set in a fantasy world filled with action, cooking, and intrigue. Solve puzzles, fight monsters, and unlock new recipes as you follow Jin and Jel on their journey to uncover the mystery of Juniper’s disappearance

name: Sly 2: Band of Thieves
summary: A port of Sly 2: Band of Thieves enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Slivania
summary: Slivania is a short-form 3D platforming metroidvania, made in under a week for the 32-Bit Winter 2024 Jam!

name: Slendrina
summary: Slendrina is a horror game where you have to find items to get you out of different places, but someone is following you all the time. And if you look at her for too long ..... well, then she will get you .....

name: Slap That
summary: Slap almost anything blocking your way in order to go deeper and deeper and discover what is going on in this world!

name: Slender: The Silent Call
summary: "Slender: The Silent Call" is a first-person psychological horror game. In this chilling experience, you will find yourself lost in a dark and menacing forest, confronting terrifying mysteries and chilling secrets. Based on character by Eric "Victor Surge" Knudson

name: Slime Killer
summary: Slime Killer is a top-down TDS action game where you have to destroy a huge number of slugs with a variety of weapons.

name: Slotter Up Core 7: Dekitou da! Street Fighter II
summary: Slotter Up Core 7: Dekitou da! Street Fighter II is a pachinko simulation based on the popular arcade hits series Street Fighter. The game features a perfect simulation of the pachinko machine with different levels of zoom, there also a sound & musics galleries and a picture gallerie with the pachinko machine flyer.

name: S.L.Y Special Project Y
summary: S.P.Y. Special Project Y is an Action game, developed and published by Konami, which was released in 1989.

name: Slendrina Must Die: The School
summary:
Slendrina Must Die - The School - is an intense and exciting horror game in which you must further explore the character of Slendrina. This evil entity is truly haunting and stops at nothing to hurt you.

Game is based on Slendrina: The School

name: Slender: Dark Woods
summary:
Slender - Dark Woods is based on Slender: The Eight Pages, but with a completely different environment, dynamic jumpscares & environment, modern graphics, new mechanics and a Co-op mode.

You can choose to play singleplayer or local co-op on 3 different difficulty levels.

name: Slime Rancher: Plortable Edition
summary: Slime Rancher is a charming, first-person, sandbox experience. Play as Beatrix LeBeau: a plucky, young rancher who sets out for a life a thousand light years away from Earth on the ‘Far, Far Range.’ Each day will present new challenges and risky opportunities as you attempt to amass a great fortune in the business of slime ranching. Collect colourful slimes, grow crops, harvest resources, and explore the untamed wilds through the mastery of your all-purpose vacpack.

name: Slender: The 8 Pages
summary:
"SLENDER THE EIGHT PAGES" Demake only for the Gameboy Color.

This is a Game Boy Color rom (.gb file). It can only be played in a Game Boy color emulator, or on "real hardware" with a "flashcart".

name: Slime Fantasy: the search for the lost sword
summary:
Slime Fantasy: the search for the lost sword is a game made on Pico-8, a retro fantasy console with purposeful limitations and low-resolution to simulate an 8-bit era console. 
 
Designed in a minimalist way, this game aims to simplify the gameplay by highlighting harmless solid objects from objects that the player must pay attention to, dangerous things, and platforms that are not safe.

name: Slither.io
summary: Slither.io is a massively multiplayer browser game where players control a snake-like avatar, which consumes multicolored pellets from other players, and ones that naturally spawn on the map in the game to grow in size. The objective of the game is to grow the longest snake in the server.

name: Slide to Solve
summary: Slide to Solve is a minimalistic & relaxing puzzle game

name: Slightly Heroes
summary: SUIT UP - Step into the role of your imaginary, half-baked superhero in this casual, cross platform shooter. Battle solo, online or versus friends in intense free-movement action!

name: Slasher: Origins
summary: Slashers is a chaotic, 2.5D, auto-attack survival game with rogue-lite elements and noir-anime storytelling. Unlock powerful heroes, create builds of unique abilities, and survive the escalating inferno of Mephistopheles’ underworld.
